Ihlathululo
Umsebenzi oqakathekileko utjho umsebenzi okungathi nawuthikanyezwako, ubeke amaphilo namkha ipilo yabantu engozini.
Ngesikhathi sokunghala umsebenzi, omunye nomunye othintekako embangweni ngananyana ngiyiphi indaba elandelako angadlulisela umbango ngomtlolo ekomitini yemisebenzi eqakathekileko:
nanyana namkha umsebenzi lowo ngoqakathekeliko namkha njani nanyana umsebenzi namkha umqatjhi wenza umsebenzi othathwa njengoqakathekileko.
Othintekako odlulisela umbango ekomitini yemisebenzi eqakathekileko kufanele anikele ngekhophi yokudluliselwa kwabanye abathintekako embangweni. Ikomiti yemisebenzi eqakathekileko kufanele ithathe isiqunto msinyana.
Imisebenzi yepalamende, imiSebenzi yesiPholisa seSewula Afrika nemisebenzi yezamaphilo misebenzi eqakathekileko.
Nawufuna ilwazi elinabileko, yiya ku-website yomNyango wezabaSebenzi.
Amagadango okufanele alandelwe
Nikela ikhophi yeforomeli komunye othintekako.
Nikela ubufakazi bona ikhophi ithunyelwe omunye othintekako ngokunamathisela:
o ikhophi yeslibhu esitlolisiweko esibuya ePosofisi; namkha o ikhophi yerasidi etlikitliweko eyathunyelwa ngesandla; namkha o istatimende esitlikitliweko esibuya emuntwini olethe iforomo; namkha o ikhophi yeslibhu esiqinisekisa ifeksi namkha obunye ubufakazi obanelisako.

ZamaPhilo nokuPhepha emSebenzini wezeLimo

Lephamfulethi inikela ilwazi elimalungana neengozi zezamaphilo
ezikhambisana nomsebenzi wezelimo, ihothikhaltjha nezamahlathi.
sizibophelele ekuvikeleni iingozi nokugula, begodu sithabela
ukuhlangana nabo boke abantu kanye neenhlangano ezisebenza
ngezamaphilo nokuphepha kwezelimo, kwezehothikhaltjha
nakwezamahlathi.
Iingozi eziphathelene nezamaphilo nokuphepha kwezelimo
Zinengi iinzathu ezingabangela bonyana umsebenzi wezelimo ube
yingozi epilwenakho, lokho kufaka hlangana:
Ukusebenzisa umzimba nawenza umsebenzi
Ukuqalana nobujamo bezulu, itjhada nanyana idengezelo
Ukuhlangana neenlwana
Ukuqalana namakhemikhali ayingozi nanyana ezinye izinto.
Ukusebenzisa umzimba lokha nawenza umsebenzakho
Isibonelo, ukusebenza ngemithwalo nanyana ukusebenza ebujameni
obumasikizi kungabangela ukuhlangahlangana kweenkhwepha
nephahla lamathambo. Lokhu kuqaqamba neenhlungu zezitho,
zamalungu nanyana zomhlana, ezingabangelwa kutshinyeka nanyana
kulimala (umonakalo odaleka emisipheni ehlanganisa amathambo
nanyana keminye imisipha), ‘ukukhwamuka’ kweengcenye ezisipara
zamathitjhu womgogodlha (ubuhlungu bomgogodlha), isayathika
(ubuhlungu obehla nengemuva lomlenze), nanyana isifo esibanga
ukuqaqamba kwamathambo wenyonga, amadolo kanye namanye
amalungu.
Balekela ukuguga imithwalo lokha nangabe kuyakghonakala,
nanyana usebenzise amarherho womtjhini
Sebenzisa amano amahle wokuguga – beka iinyawo zakho kuhle,
unqophise umgogodlhakho bese ubambela umthwalo eduze
komzimbakho
Yenza isiqiniseko sokobana indawo osebenza kiyo ihleleke ngendlela
ezakwenza bonyana izinto kanye nemikhiqizo ifumaneke lula ngaphandle
kokuzelula begodu ulinge nokutjintja imisebenzi nanyana ukutjhida ukwenzela
bonyana ukwazi ukusebenzisa imisipha eyahlukahlukeneko emzimbeni.
Ukusebenzisa imitjhini ngokuphephileko emaplasini
Yenza isiqiniseko sokobana imitjhini oyisebenzisako:
Ilungele umsebenzi
Iyatjhejwa ukwenzela bonyana ikwazi ukusetjenziswa ngokuphephileko
Ifakelwe amarherho wokuvikela afunwa mthetho, begodu kufuze uqinisekise
bonyana amarherho lawo:
- aqine ngokwaneleko begodu nokobana, lokha nasele afakiwe, akukghonakali
bonyana angakhutjhwa lula
- enziwe ngematheriyali elungileko. Iplastiki yenza bonyana umuntu akwazi
ukubona lula kodwana ingonakala lula
- asebenziseka lula
Lokha nangabe iimvikeli zihlanganisiwe, isibonelo lokha nangabe ilanga elinye
nelinye ufuna ukungena engcenyeni eyingozi amahlandla ambalwa, kufuze
uhlole bonyana:
- Umtjhini angeze waduma ngaphambi kobana isivikeli sijame ngomumo nanyana
njani
- Ukuvula isivikeli kujamisa umtjhini nanyana ingcenye leyo
- Iswitjhi nanyana ivelfu elihlanganisako linamandla ngokwaneleko bonyana
lingakghona ukwenza umsebenzi nanyana njani, begodu nokobana indlela
elisebenza ngayo akubi yindlela ezakubhalelisa omunye umuntu ukusebenza.
Iimvikeli zetjhafti ezisebenzisa amandla wommoya
Mayelana neemvikeli zetjhafti ezisebenzisa amandla wommoya, kufuze
uhlole bonyana isivikeli:
Senziwe ngokwezinga elamukelekako nanyana njani
Ubukhulu nobude obulungileko betjhafti, lokha nangabe ivaliwe nalokha
nangabe yeluliwe
Umhlobo ongazombeleziko, ofakelwe isisetjenziswa esilawulako
(isib. iinketani zokuvikela)
Kufuze usetjenziswe begodu utjhejwe ngokufaneleko – sula bewezese
iimvikeli njalonjalo
Kufuze usekelwe lokha nangabe awukahlanganiswa – ungawusamisi
ngesimbi yokudosa nanyana uwehlisele phasi, begodu ungawujamisi
emmoyeni ngesisetjenziswa esilawulako
Kufuze uphephe malungana nokoniwa yifuyo, lokha nangabe umtjhini
awusetjenziswa.
Ukuthenga nanyana ukuqatjha imitjhini
Lokha nangabe uthenga nanyana uqatjha imitjhini umthetho ufuna
bonyana umthengisi akunikele iimvikeli ezidingekako. Yenza isiqiniseko
sikobana wena nabasebenzi bakho:
Nisebenzisa imitjhini ngokulandela imilayo eninikelwe yona
Nibeka iimvikeli lapho kusetjenzelwa khona  nihlolisise ‘ukuphepha’
kwazo zoke iinsetjenziswa bese nilungisa zoke iimphoso ngaphambi
kokuzisebenzisa okhunye nokhunye
Nihlola bonyana iinlawuli zimeregwe ngokubonakalako nanyana njani
ukukhombisa lokho ezikwenzako kanye nemitjhini eziyilawulako, begodu
etlanywe beyabekwa lapho ungeze wayisebenzisa khona ngengozi
Nihlola bonyana imitjhini ejamileko ikhanyiswe ngokwaneleko nanyana
njani
Nihlola bonyana imitjhini yegezi iyahlukaniswa begodu iyakhiyelelwa lokha
nangabe iimvikeli zisusiwe
Nibandulelwa ukusebenza ngokuphephileko begodu ninikelwa izambatho
zokuvikela enizakwazi ukuzisebenzisa.
Ukulonda nokubhlogulula
Izehlakalo ezinengi zemitjhini zenzeka lokha nakwenziwa imisebenzi
yokulonda nanyana yokubhlogulula. Khumbula ‘jamisa ngokuphephileko’
bese uyaqinisekisa bonyana:
Istafu sibandulwa ngokufaneleko ukwenza umsebenzi
Amathulusi kanye nemilayo yokulonda, ukuhlalisa kuhle, ukuhlanza kanye
nokubhlogulula imitjhini iyanikelwa
Kwenziwa begodu kusetjenziswa iindlela zokusebenza eziphephileko
Amandla abulungiweko, isibonelo lawo avela ematheriyalini egandelelweko,
eempringhini nanyana kuhayidroligi, apheliswa ngaphambi kobana uthome
umsebenzi
Imitjhini nanyana iingcenye zemitjhini eziphakanyiswa ngokusebenzisa
ihayidroligi ibhalelwa kukwehla nawusebenzisa imitjhini enjengeentopo
nanyana iinjege lokha abantu nabasebenza ngaphasi kwayo.
Boke abasebenzisi kufuze baqinisekise bonyana:
Bayakwazi ukujamisa umtjhini ngaphambi kobana bawudumise
Bawudumisa bajame endaweni elungileko ngeenkhathi zoke
Zoke iimvikeli zifakiwe begodu zisebenza ngendlela ekungiyo
Indawo emagega nalapho kufakwe khona imitjhini ihlanzekile,
ibugwala begodu ayinazo iinliyo
Bazisa umtlhogomeli wabo msinyana lokha nangabe umtjhini
awusebenzi ngokufaneleko
Bambatha izambatho kanye neensetjenziswa zokuzivikela ezifaneleko.
Ungathomi:
Usebenzise umtjhini ungakagunyazwa begodu ungakabundulelwa
ukuwusebenzisa
Ulinge ukubhlogulula nanyana ukuhlanza umtjhini lokha nangabe
 idrayivu ayikahlukaniswa begodu umtjhini awukajami tsi
Ufake iinketani ezilengako, izambatho ezilengako, amadlhavu nanyana
iindzilamnwana, nanyana ube neenhluthu ezide ezingabanjwa ziingcenye
ezikhambako zomtjhini
Usithe abantu abasebenzisa imitjhini
Uhlike itregere ingakajami nanyana uhlike omunye umtjhini ozikhambelako.
Ukusebenzisa igezi ngokuphephileko
Igezi iyabulala. Qobe mnyaka abantu abathathu nanyana abane
babulawa yigezi ekorweni yezelimo. Inengi lezehlakalwezi libandakanya
ukuthinta iintambo zegezi ezingehla kweenhloko. Ezinye
zibandakanya iinsetjenziswa ezibanjwa ngezandla nanyana
amakheyibuli wokwelula angalondwa kuhle. Ukufakwa kumbi
kwegezi kanye neensetjenziswa zegezi ezingakalungi
kungabangela ukutjha.
Iintambo zegezi ezikhamba ngehla kweenhloko
Igezi ingeqa iinkhala lokha nangabe iinsetjenziswa nanyana imitjhini
iba seduze khulu: asikho isidingo sokobana uphathe iintambo zegezi
ezikhamba ngaphezu kweenhloko (ama-OHPL) ezingakulimaza.
Lokha nangabe iintambo zegezi ziqamula endawenakho, khulumisana
nomthengisigezi wakho bonyana angeze kwakghonakala bonyana
iintambezo zikhanjiswe ngendlela enye etja, zikhanjiswe ngaphasi
komhlaba, nanyana ziphakanyiswe. Nangabe lokho akukghonakali
bonyana kungenziwa, yenza isiqiniseko sokobana uthola imebhe
yeendlela zeentambo (itholakala kumthengisipahla wakho) begodu
uqinisekise bonyana abasebenzi abavakatjhileko njengabosokontraga
bafumana amakhophi.
Ungathomi:
Usebenze ngaphasi kweentambo zegezi ezikhamba ngehla
kweenhloko ngaphandle kokulandela irherho lokusebenza ngokuphepha,
nanyana ngaphandle kokuvumela nanyana ngiyiphi ingcenye yomtjhini
(isib. isifafazi sesivuno, umatipana) nanyana ilere, iphayiphu lokuthelelela
njll., bonyana libe ngaphakathi kwamamitha ali-15 wazo. Sebenzisa
amalebula ayelelisako emitjhinini esendaweni ephakemeko
Wakhe idrada yokukampela magega nendlela ekukhamba kiyo iintambo
zegezi ezikhamba ngehla kweenhloko, nanyana utjhidisele nanyana
uqinise khulu idrada yokukampela lapho ingeqa khona ithintane nentambo
yegezi.
Iindrada ezide ezikhamba ehlabathini eneenkhisi zibanga ingozi ekhethekileko
Wakhe amatjherefu wehoyi, amawobhu nanyana imakhiwo, nanyana wakhe
amazala, ngaphasi nanyana eduze kweentambo zegezi ezikhamba ngehla
kweenhloko nanyana ngaphasi nanyana eduze kweendrada zokusekela amapala
Ubulunge imitjhini ngokuyisamisa emibhotjhongweni yeentambo
ezikhamba ngehla kweenhloko, emapalini nanyana eendradeni zokusekela
amapala.
Ukuthinta iintambo zegezi ezikhamba ngehla kweenhloko kungabangela
bonyana ukukhanjiswa kwamandla wegezi ‘kujame kungasebenza’
kwesikhatjhana – kodwana kungahlanganiswa kabutjha sisetjenziswa
esizenzakalelako. Ungathomi uhlukanise isisetjenziswa umnikazi wentambo
yegezi angakatjho bonyana intambo leyo ayinamlilo. Lokha nangabe kufuze
usebenze eduze kweentambo zegezi ezikhamba ngehla kweenhloko, kufuze
ufumane abathengisigezi bese wenza amalungiselelo wokobana intambo leyo bayihlukanise kwesikhatjhana. 
Amakheyibuli angaphasi komhlaba
Lokha nangabe kungenzeka usebenze eduze kwamakheyibuli angaphasi
komhlaba, kufuze bonyana ufumane ilwazi malungana nendlela akhamba
kiyo ekhamphanini ethengisa igezi. Thola umuntu onekghono umkhombele
bonyana ahlole bonyana akunamakheyibuli ngaphambi kobana wembe
imigodi phakathi kweendlela nanyana eduze kwemakhiwo.
Irherho lakho legezi
Yenza isiqiniseko sokobana:
Kuba neswitjhi esifumaneka nesibonakala lula eduze komunye
nomunye umtjhini ofakiweko ukwenzela bonyana ukwazi ukucima
igezi nakunesehlakalo esirhabekileko
Amakheyibuli wamandla wegezi atjhinga emitjhinini avikeleke
ngokulingeneko (ikheyibuli ephuthelwe ngesivikeli, ephuthelwe
ngeraba nanyana ngeniyoprini, nanyana efakwe ngephayiphini)
begodu ahlanganiswe kuhle etheminalini
Amadlhowubhu avikelekile (isibonelo sebenzisa iingcenye zomhlobo
ohlukanisako)
Kunamasokhede wegezi alingeneko wokuplaga igezi – ukudisibeza amasokhede
wokuplaga igezi ngokusebenzisa ama-adaptha kungaba ngunobangela
wokutjha. Eendaweni ezifaneleko (isib. i-ofisi leplasi) ungasebenzisa isokhede
lokuplaga izinto ezinengi
Amaplaga anamaphini amathathu aneendawana zokuvalela iintambo zegezi
ngaphakathi ukwenzela bonyana iintambezo (khulukhulu isibambimbani)
zingaphumi ematheminalini wazo
Amafiyozi, iinkhandeli zokutleleza kwetlelezomlilo nangabe kunephoso njll.,
zilinganiswa ngefanelo, zilinganiselwe isekhede ezilivikelako. Akukafaneli
bonyana amafiyozi agegedwe, afakelwe iintambo ezinengi ngokweqileko
nanyana aphuthelwe ngefoyili
Usebenzisa iplaga nesokhede efaneleko malungana nesisetjenziswa
esisebenzisa itlelezomlilo elinengi (isib. abantu abajhiselelako)
Amasokhede wegezi afakwe ngaphandle, eendaweni eziswe nanyana
ezidlavuzako, nanyana lapho kusetjenziswa khona iintunjana zokukhupha
umrhwamuko nanyana amanzi, amhlobo olungileko (thola iseluleko, ungathomi
usebenzise umhlobo wesekhede yegezi esetjenziswa ekhaya) begodu avikelwe
ngesisetjenziswa setlelezomlilo eliseleko (i-RCD)
Iimphuthelo zeensetjenziswa zegezi zihlala zivaliwe begodu (nangabe
kuyakghonakala) ziyakhiyelelwa, begodu isikhiya siphathwa mumuntu onesibopho
Iinswitjhi zitholakala lula begodu zikhonjwa ngokubonakalako begodu umuntu
omunye nomunye uyakghona ukusisebenzisa lokha nangabe kunesehlakalo
esirhabekileko
Lokha nawutjhubhelako iintambo zegezi uzikhambisa ngaphakathi kwephayiphu
nanyana okhunye okufana nalo ukwenzela bonyana zingoniwa makhondlo
Iindawo ekufakwe kizo igezi zinande zihlolwa begodu zilungiswe ngusogezi
onekghono
Amakheyibuli onakeleko ayalungiswa nanyana ajanyiselelwa ngaphandle
kokumorosa isikhathi.
Iinsetjenziswa eziphathekako
Amathulusi asetjenziswa ngaphandle nanyana lapho umsebenzi omnengi
wesimbi unesibambimbani khona kufuze asetjenziswe ngevolitheyiji
ephungiliweko yesitjhugululimfutho esihlukanisako sokuphepha (isibonelo
isentha yamavolthi ali-110 ehlanganiswe nesibambimbani) nanyana
esihlanganiswe nge-RCD ezakwazi ukuwisa amandla wegezi msinyana
nangabe kunephutha lesibambimbani. Tjheja bonyana ungakghona
ukubalekela ukusetjenziswa kwegezi unomphela nanyana njani, isibonelo
ngokusebenzisa amathulusi asebenza ngommoya ebusebenzelweni (kodwana
kufuze uhlole amazinga wetjhada).
Yenza isiqiniseko sokobana wena nestafu sakho:
Nisebenzisa amaplaga kanye neengcenye ezithile zegezi eziqine ngokulingeneko
begodu ezilungele ubujamo obumanzi nanyana obunethuli obuvamise ukutholakala
kwezelimo
Nihlola amathulusi aphathekako njalonjalo. Ningakhohlwa amathulusi
aqatjhiweko nanyana abolekiweko
Nilisa ukusebenzisa amathulusi eniwasolako nanyana anamaphutha, niyawathatha niwabeke endaweni ephephileko begodu niqinisekise bonyana aniwasebenzisi
ukufikela lapho alungiswa khona mumuntu onekghono
Ninikela omunye umuntu isibopho sokusebenzisa njalonjalo iinkunubhe ‘zokuhlahluba’ ezikuma-RCD ukuqinisekisa bonyana zisebenza ngefanelo
Nicima iinkunubhe zamathulusi nezamasokhede womlilo ngaphambi kobana niplage
kiwo
Niplagulula nanyana nihlukanisa iinsetjenziswa ngaphambi kobana nizihlanze
nanyana nenze amatjhuguluko kizo
Niba namasokhede alingeneko wegezi ukwenzela bonyana ningasebenzisi khulu iintambo
eziseluli zokukhambisa igezi. Lokha nangabe kufuze kusetjenziswe intambo esiseluli yokukhambisa igezi, kufuze nihlole bonyana intambo leyo isebujameni obuhle nanyana njani begodu nihlole nokobana ibekwe endaweni engeze yonakala nayikiyo nanyana njani
Lokha nanitjhiselelako, kufuze nisebenzise kwaphela iintambo eziseluli zokukhambisa
igezi eziphuthelweko kanye neembambi ze-elekhthrowudi ezingakonakali.
Ukurogwa yigezi
Kuqakathekile ukwazi bonyana kufuze wenzeni lokha nangabe omunye umuntu urogwe yigezi. Kufuze ngeenkhathi zoke ukhumbule ukuhlukanisa umthombo wamandla wegezi
ntangi, nanyana nangabe lokho akukghonakali, ungathomi uthinte umuntu obulewe yigezi, ungamthinta kwaphela ngezinto ezingadlulisi itlelezomlilo - ungathomi usebenzise isimbi. Iphaphamiso lidinga ibandulo nokuzijayeza. Ngebanga lalokho, kufuze wenze isiqiniseko sokobana istafu sakho sifumana ibandulo elisisendlalelo sesizo lokuthoma. Kufuze ubonise ikhophi ‘yeplakhadi yokurogwa yigezi’ ekhombisa lokho ekufuze ukwenze.
Itjhada
Lokha nawunande uzifumana usetjhadeni elinengi, kungenza bonyana ugcine ungasezwa eendlebeni unomphela. Kufuze utjheje:
Ukusebenza ngaphandle kwebhopduluko elinganatjhada
Ukuphungula itjhada, isibonelo ngokusebenzisa isiphunguli-tjhada
Isidingo sokusebenzisa isikhandeli-tjhada.
Idengezelo
Lokhu kungalimaza izandla nemikhono (khulukhulu lokha nawusebenzisa iinsarha zeketani
nanyana iingrayindere), nanyana umzimba woke (khulukhulu lokha nawutjhayela
iintregere nanyana iinlori zokuguga izinto). Ukuvikela ukuphathwa mgogodlha nanyana
yinyonga/lidolo ngenca yokudengezela komzimba woke (i-WBV) kufuze:
Usebenzise ithulusi elifaneleko lomsebenzi, isibonelo itregere yesimanjemanje enesihlalo
esilondwa nesitjhugululwa ngefanelo
Utjhayele ngebelo elifaneleko begodu utjheje nobujamo baphasi, ugegede imigodi njll.
Ukubalekela umonakalo ongadaleka malungana nokuzombeleza kweengazi emzimbeni,
malungana nemizwa, imisipha namathambo wezandla kanye nomonakalo ongadaleka malungana nemikhono ngenca yedengezelo lezandla nemikhono (iHAV) kufuze:
Utlame imisebenzi ukwenzela bonyana ukwazi ukubalekela ukusebenzisa amathulusi adengezelako
Ukhethe amathulusi anamazinga aphasi wedengezelo, isibonelo isarha yeketani
eneentlabagelo zokuvikela idengezelo
Usebenzise idlheganiso lemisebenzi nangabe kuyakghonakala – phumula ngeenkhathi ezifaneleko
Ufuthumeze izandla zakho ngaphambi kobana uthome ukusebenza (begodu qinisekisa bonyana zihlala zifuthumele).
Ubujamo bezulu
Ukuzifumana usebujameni obuthile bezulu ngeenkhathi zoke, khulukhulu
umtjhiso welanga nanyana ilothe elikhulu kungaba yingozi.
Khumbula:
Lokha nakutjhisako kufuze wembathe izambatho ezilula begodu uthwale
nengwani yelanga – ungahlubuli usale ngomzimba; zesa isikhumba sakho
esivele ngaphandle ngesezeso sokuvikela isikhumba ekutjhisweni lilanga
Tlhogomela amabala anzima, iinsupa nanyana ukutjhuguluka kombala.
Bonana nodorhodere nangabe uthoma ukuvela amabala anzima njll. nawuthoma
ukopha nanyana isikhumba sakho nasithoma ukuba buzikazikani
Ukusebenzisa izambatho zobujamo bezulu - uthambile kungathuwelelisa
ilothe.
Iinlwana
Ukuthinta iinlwana kungabangela izunosisi (ubulwelwe abantu ababuthola
ngokuthinta iinlwana) kufaka hlangana i-orfu, ubuthi bembuzana nanyana
ilepthospirosisi etholakala eenkomeni nanyana emakhondlweni. Amatshwayo
wakhona kungaba miraro yesikhumba kanye nobujamo obuzenza samgomani
obungabangela ukugula isikhathi eside nangabe abulatjhwa.
Hlamba izandla nemikhonwakho ngeenkhathi zoke nabegade usebenza
ngeenlwana nanyana eendaweni ezinamakhondlo
Bopha woke amanceba wokusikwa newokukghubuka ngamatjhila angangeni amanzi
Mbatha izambatho zokuzivikela njengamadlhavu lapho kunesidingo khona.
Izinto eziyingozi
Ukuzifumana usebujameni bokusebenza ngamakhemikhali ayingozi
nanyana ezinye izinto, isibonelo njengeembulaliinunwana, imithi
yokwelapha iinlwana (ifaka hlangana iindibhu zezimvu), ithuli,
umthunyiselo nanyana iimatheriyali ezinjengehlanganisela yamanzi
namakhemikhali, ihlanganisela yokusahlabathi neswiriji nanyana
iimvundisi; ifuru, ihoyi; ukuthinta ihlanganisela yamanzi namakhemikhali,
umsuqwa njll.; nanyana ukuchatjhazelwa ziimbulaliinunwana nanyana
yidibhu yezimvu kungabangela ukugula.
Abaqatjhi nabantu abazisebenzako kufuze batjheje bonyana bona nanyana
abasebenzi babo:
Kufuze basebenzise, nanyana basebenze ngento leyo nanyana njani
Bangasebenzisa iindlela zokulawula zobunjiniyera ezinjengeenkhandeli
zokuchatjhazelwa ngokumamanzi, iinsetjenziswa zokukhambisa iimatheriyali
eziqinileko nanyana iinsetjenziswa zokukhupha ithuli.
Kwezinye iinkhathi kuzakudingeka bonyana abaqatjhi kanye nabantu
abazisebenzako banikele begodu baqinisekise bonyana abasebezi babo
basebenzisa iinsetjenziswa zokuzivikela.
Ukubika amalwelwe aphathelene nomsebenzi
Amanye amalwelwe abangelwa msebenzi kufuze abikwe emNyangweni
wezabaSebenzi.
Ungabanjwa bulwelwe ongabubika lokha nawusebenza:
Ngeenlwana - amalwelwe abangelwa kuthinta iinlwana njengebhruselosisi,
 ilepthospirosisi, ubulwelwe obubangelwa kulunywa mikhaza nanyana
i-streptococcus suis, nanyana obunye nobunye ubulwelwe obubangelwa
kusebenza ngeenlwana
Ngeembulaliinunwana - ukudla itjhefu yemivango ye-oganofosforasi
nanyana i-methyl bromide
Ngezinto zemvelo - i-asma oyifumana emsebenzini lokha nawusebenza
ngethuli leenthoro nanyana ngeenunwana ezisetjenziselwa ukulawula iinunwana ngokwebhayoloji; ubuhlungu bamaphaphu womlimi obubangelwa yikghoro
yehoyi/yekhowe nanyana ubuhlungu bamaphaphu womsebenzi obubangelwa 
yikghoro yehoyi, yifuru nanyana yivundela yekhowe; nanyana inghanghabalomhlathi
Ngezinye izinto - ubulwelwe bokuba bomvu nokuba buhlungu kwesikhumba
(idemathayithisi) obufumana emsebenzini lokha nawusebenza umsebenzi
obandakanya iincibilikisi nanyana iimbulalambewu zamalwelwe
Ngemitjhi - isede yeentjengisabulwelwe zedengezelo lezandla nemikhono
ezibangelwa kusebenza ngeensarha zeenketani, amabhratjhikhatha nanyana
iinsarha ezisandulungu ezisebenza ngezandla.
Ilwazi elinabileko
Abahloli bangathintwa ema-ofisini alandelako womNyango wezabaSebenzi:

Imisebenzi yokubuyiselwa ebujameni bangaphambilini kwabarholopheleko
Ihlathululo
Amagadango okufanele alandelwe
Imithetho esetjenziswako
Amazinga wokusebenza nesikhathi
Iindleko
Amaforomo azaliswako
Imininingwana yokuthintana

Ihlathululo

Imisebenzi yokubuyisela ebujameni bangaphambilini inikelwa ebantwini abarholopheleko ukubarhelebha bona bafikelele bebagcine amazinga wabo wokusebenza. Kunamazinga amane wemisebenzi yokubuyisela ebujameni bangaphambilini eqalelele amazinga ahlukeneko wokurholophala, begodu wona nginaka:

Misebenzi yokuthoma yokubuyisela ebujameni bangaphambilini
Lizinga lesibili lokubuyisela ebujameni bangaphambilini
Lizinga lokubuyisela ebujameni bangaphambilini esikhungweni esisebenza lokho
Kubuyisela ebujameni bangaphambilini okwenziwa sisazi namkha ngokomkhumbulo

Imisebenzi yokubuyisela ebujameni bangaphambilini misebenzi yokukhandela eyakha ukuzithemba nekghono leklayenti. Lokhu kufaka irhelebho lezengqondo, imisebenzi esemakhaya, iinqhema zokusekela nokuzirhelebha, kanye namahlelo wokwazi newokusekela.

Izinga lesibili lokubuyiselwa ebujameni bangaphambilini kungenelela ekuthomeni  misebenzi efaka iinkulumo-fundiswano zokuvikela, itlhogomelo lemini nemisebenzi yokuvuselela, amaphrojekthi wokwenza ingeniso nokuphelisa umtlhago, ituthuko yomntwana osakhulako nemisebenzi yokuphelisa kwesikhatjhana.

Izinga lokubuyiselwa ebujameni bangaphambilini esikhungweni esisebenza lokho ifaka itlhogomelo lekuhlaleni, itlhogomelo lokukhulisa nemisebenzi yoku-adoptha, neyokwakha butjha nemisebenzi yetlhogomelo lamuva.

Ukubuyisela ebujameni bangaphambilini okwenziwa sisazi namkha ngokomkhumbulo msebenzi ofana nokuyelelisa nokubandula, ukunikela amandla, ukwenziwa komthethomgomo nehlelo kanye nerhubhululo.

Phezulu

Amagadango okufanele alandelwe

Vakatjhela isentha eseduze yethlogomelo lokuthoma lezamaphilo namkha ikliniki bona uyokuhlolwa begodu uzakudluliselwa esibhedlela lapho uzakunikelwa itjhejo lokubuyisela ebujameni bangaphambilini namkha esazini ezingeni lesibili lesikhungo namkha esibhedlela esisebenza lokhu.

Phezulu

Imithetho esetjenziswako

Phezulu

Amazinga wokusebenza nesikhathi

Kungathatha pheze iinyanga ezintathu ukusebenzana nesibawo sakho. Kobunye ubujamo abantu balinda iinyanga ezisithandathu.

Phezulu

Iindleko

Kobunye ubujamo, amaphesente ama-75 wesabelo sokurholophala athathwa njengesiquntu seendleko. Ezinye iindleko ziquntwa ngeenkghonakalisi zomuntu. Ezinye iinkghonakalisi zilinganiswa ngokuya ngokuthi ngikuphi umndeni ongakghona ukukubhadela. Zoke iindlekwezi zihluka ngokuya kwamaphrovinsi.

Phezulu

Amaforomo azaliswako

Isentha yokubuyisela ebujameni bangaphambilini namkha isentha yetlhogomelo lokuthoma lezamaphilo iqunta ngamaforomo okufanele azaliswe.

Ihlathululo
Ukuhlongakala kufanele kubikwe komunye wabantu abalandelako:
amalunga athileko womNyango weeNdaba zeKhaya amalunga we-SAPS, khulu khulu eendaweni lapho iiNdaba zeKhaya zinganama-ofisi khona abangcwabi abakhonjwe nabaziwako ngokuya komthetho.
Phezulu
Amagadango okufanele alandelwe
Udorhodera ohlole umzimba wohlongakeleko kufanele:
o asinikele isihlobo sohlongakeleko namkha umngcwabi ozakuhlela umngcwabo o avale ikhasi 2 leforomo lesibawo BI-1663.
Nayikuthi akunadorhodera, isibonelo, eendaweni ezikude zemakhaya, umrholi wendabuko uzakuzalisa umBiko wokuHlongakala (okuliforomo BI-1680).
Isihlobo kufanele sithathe umtlolo siwuse kungcwabi ozakwenza amalungiselelo womngcwabo.
Nayikuthi umngcwabi ugunyaziwe ukufumana izaziso zokuhlongakala, ukuzalisa amarejista wokuhlongakala nokukhupha imilayo yokungcwaba, umngcwabi:
Nayikuthi umngcwabi akakagunyazwa ukufumana izaziso zokuhlongakala, angazalisa kuphela ihlangothi C leforomo BI-1663.
Isihlobo namkha umngcwabi ogunyaziweko kufanele manje alethe imitlolo kwelinye nelinye i-ofisi leeNdaba zeKhaya (namkha nayikuthi akuna-ofisi leeNdaba zeKhaya endaweni leyo, alise kwelinye nelinye igatja le-SAPS) khona kuzakukhutjhwa umlayo wokungcwaba begodu kuragelwe phambili nokusetjenzwa kokutloliswa kwemitlolo.
Nayikuthi isakhamuzi seSewula Afrika namkha umnikazi wemvumo yokuhlala yakanomphela uhlongakalela ngaphandle kweSewula Afrika, ukuhlongakala komuntu lowo kufanele kubikwe ebuzendeni namkha emtjihini yeSewula Afrika. Ikhophi eqinisekisiweko yesitifikhethi sokuhlongakala esikhutjhwe yinarha etjhili ethintekako naso kufanele silethwe.

Ihlathululo

Inarha karhulumende engakolodwako iqatjhiselwa iminqopho yezokulima bona ekugcineni ingathengwa namkha ingathengwa, kuye ngobujamo benarha . Iimvumelwano zokuqatjhisa ezinokukhetha kokuyithenga ekugcineni zivuseleleka njalo eminyakeni emithathu.

UmNyango wezokuLima wesitjhaba usebenza ukughonakalisa ukuphathwa kuhle kanye nokuthengiswa kwenarha yezokulima yakarhulumende eyafunyanwa ngerhelebho leBhodo yesiKolodo sezokuLima  .

Phezulu

Amagadango okufanele alandelwe

Lokha inarha karhulumende itholakala bona ingaqatjhiswa, umNyango wezokuLima uyikhangisa ngokusebenzisa izaziso eendaweni ezithileko esifundeni, ezifana nama-ofisi wabomarhastrada, iintetjhi zamapholisa namaphephandaba.
Yenza isibawo emuntwini otjhiwo esazisweni.

Ihlathululo

Ukupheliswa komtlhago kwezehlalakuhle kunikelwa kwerhelebho lesikhatjhana ebantwini abatlhoga ngendlela yokuthi abakghoni ukuhlangabezana neendingo ezisikelo zemindeni yabo.
Ngubani ongafumana irhelebho lokupheliswa kokutshwenyeka?

Ungafumana irhelebho lokupheliswa komtlhago embusweni nayikuthi usebujameni obumbi khulu.

Ubujamo obumbi khulu buvela ngombana:

utlhoga irhelebho ngesikhathi usalinde ukusetjenzwa kwezabelo zabantwana mbuso
ubujamo obumbi khulu benzekile, njengokutjha kwendlu yakho
awufaneleki kufumana isabelo, begodu usebujameni obumbi khulu
awukghoni ukusebenza ngombana awukaphili kuhle – lokhu kutjho bona ugule isikhathi esingaphasi kweenyanga ezisithandathu
awukghoni ukufumana imali yesondlo embelethini namkha ebabelethini bomntwana namkha babantwana
okunguye yedwa osebenzako emndenini uhlongakele
okunguye yedwa osebenzako emndenini uthunyelwe ejele isikhathi esifitjhani 
uthintwe yihlekelele, kodwana indawo namkha umphakathi ohlala kiwo awukathathwa njengendawo evelelwe yihlekelele.

Uthola ini?

UkuPheliswa komTlhago kwezeHlalakuhle kungaba yiphasela yokudla namkha ivawutjha yokuthenga ukudla. Amanye amaphrovinsi anikela ngerhelebho lemali. UkuPheliswa komTlhago kwezeHlalakuhle kunikelwa isikhathi esifitjhani kuphela – ngokujayelekileko ukufika eenyangeni ezintathu, begodu kwesinye isikhathi iinyanga ezisithandathu.

Phezulu

Amagadango okufanele alandelwe



Yenza isibawo sokupheliswa komtlhago kwezehlalakuhle e-ofisini eliseduze lomNyango wezeHlalakuhle.
Letha isibawo sakho nemitlolo elandelako:
Umazisi wakho oneenomboro ezili-13 nebhakhowudi kanye neentifikhethi zamabeletho zabantwana.
Imitlolo elandelako ingafuneka nangabe umazisi namkha isitifiketi samabeletho asikho:
i-avidavidi eyenziwe yi-Justice of the Peace. I-avidavidi kumele ibe nendinyana etjhoko bonyana ilwazi elingasingilo nelinganembiko lizakurholela ekubotjhweni ngokwesigaba 21 somThetho weRhelebho lezeHlalakuhle, umThetho, ka-2004
isitatimende esifungelweko mumuntu othembekileko owazi umbawi kunye nomntwana wakhe. Lokho kungenziwa likhansela, umrholi wendabuko, isisebenzi sezehlalakuhle namkha umfundisi
isitjengiso sokobana isibawo sesitifiketi samabeletho namkha umazisi sesenziwe emNyangweni weNdaba zangeKhaya
nakukghonekako, umazisi wesikhatjhana okhitjhwa mNyango weNdaba zangeKhaya 
isitifiketi sokubhabhadiswa
ikarada lekliniga
iripoto yesikolo.



Tjheja: Akunasibawo esizakuqalwa kunganisitatimende esifungelweko/avidavidi.

Tjengisa ubufakazi bonyana:

wenze isibawo sesabelo
ube nobujamo oburhabako 
ulingile ukufumana isondlo
awunalo elinye isekelo
utjhadile, uhlukanisile namkha awukatjhadi
awunangeniso
unokurholophala kwesitjhana.

Imithetho esetjenziswako





Social Assistance Act, 2004  

Phezulu

Amazinga wokusebenza nesikhathi



Isibawo sakho sisetjenzwa khonokho.
Nasele ulethe isibawo sakho, sizakuhlolwa bonyana ngesamambala na kanye nokutlhoga kwakho kwamabala irhelebho.
Nanyana unganayo yoke imitlolo, uzakufumana iphasela yakho yokudla yenyanga yokuthoma, ivawutjha namkha imali ngaphandle kwayo.
Khumbula ukusa yoke imitlolo esiphathisweni ngaphambi kokufika kwelanga lokubhadelwa lenyanga yesibili. Nawungenzi njalo, ungahle ungayifumana iphasela yakho yokudla, ivawutjha namkha imali.
Nayikuthi akunatjhuguluko ebujameni bakho ngemva kobana ufumane isabelo iinyanga ezintathu, ungenza isibawo sokobana isabelo sikhuliswe sibe ziinyanga ezintathu.

Ihlathululo
Obhadela umthelo kasolanga angahlathululwa ngendlela elandelako:
Lapho ikampani ingakadosi umthelo womsebenzi emrholweni womnqophisi, umnqophisi akakavunyelwa ukuthatha ukubhadelwa komthelo okunjalo nakaqunta ngesikolodo somthelo kasolanga.
Umuntu onesikolodo somthelo kasolanga kufanele kungakapheli amalanga ama-30 wokukoloda, enze isibawo ngomtlolo sokuzitlolisa e-ofisini legatja le-SARS eliseduze. Ukubhalelwa kukwenza njalo kuzakuba nomphumela wenzuzo nehlawulo ekubhadeleni kwangemva kwesikhathi nokulethwa sekudlule isikhathi kwamaforomo.
Abantu abalandelako akufuneki bona babhadele umthelo kasolanga:
omunye nomunye umuntu ingeniso yakhe efunyanwa kuphela ngomrholo omunye nomunye umuntu ingeniso yakhe engadluli ubunengi bomthelo. Omunye nomunye umuntu ingeniso yakhe engadluli ubunengi bomthelo oyi-R43 000 ebantwini abangaphasi kweminyaka ema-65, kuthi i-R69 000 ebantwini abangaphezu kweminyaka ema-65
omunye nomunye umuntu ngaphandle kwengeniso efunyanwa emrholweni, ofumana ingeniso yamasiso engadluli i-R18 000 ebantwini abangapahsi kweminyaka ema-65 namkha i-R26 000 ebantwini abaneminyaka engaphezu kwama-65. Inzuzo yangaphandle nemali efunyanwa ngamasiso ayifakwa kuphela ukufika ku-R3 000 ekubekweni ngaphandle kwesibalo omunye nomunye umuntu oneminyaka ema-65 namkha ngaphezulu ubekelwa ngeqadi ekubhadeleni umthelo kasolanga nayikuthi:
o ingeniso etheliswako yakhe yonyaka weemali ayidluli i-R80 000 begodu ibunjwa mrholo, ipentjhini, imali ebhadelwa ngokusisa namkha ingeniso yerente begodu o akasi mnqophisi wekampani yangeqadi namkha lilunga le-close corporation begodu o akasenzi ibhizinisi.
Phezulu
Amagadango okufanele alandelwe
Letha isibawo sokutloliswa njengobhadela umthelo kasolanga e-ofisini legatja le-SARS eliseduze ngencwadi. Incwadi kufanele ibeke ilanga othoma ngalo ukubhadela ukwenzela iminqopho yomThelo kaSolanga.

Ihlathululo
Imvumo yokurweyila inganikelwa iphandle elizibandakanya ehlelweni lezamasiko, zomnotho namkha lezokuhlalisana, elihlelwe namkha eliphethwe liphiko lakarhulumende namkha sikhungo sefundo ephakamileko ngokubambisana nephiko lenarha yangaphandle. Yenza isibawo ebuzendeni namkha imitjhini yeSewula Afrika.
Phezulu
Amagadango okufanele alandelwe
Veza iphaspoti esebenzako.
Veza incwadi ebuya esikhungweni, ehlanganweni namkha emndenini lapho uhlose ukubamba ihlelo lakho eSewula Afrika, eqinisekisa ubujamo namkha ukubakhona kwehlelo lokurweyila. Incwadi kufanele itjengise bonyana uyafaneleka kukuzitlolisa namkha kukuzibandakanya begodu isikhungo, ihlangano namkha umndeni uzakutlhogomela ngesikhathi sokuhlala kwakho enarheni.
Veza incwadi ebuya esikhungweni sakarhulumende namkha ihlangano esekelako enarheni yombawi, eqinisekisa ukubakhona kwehlelo lokurweyila begodu nebeka bona wamukelwe ukuzitlolisa ehlelweni.

Ihlathululo
Lomsebenzi utholakala ama-awara ama-24 komunye nomunye umuntu ofuna ukubika ubulelesi ngomtato ngokunikela ngelwazi elingarhelebha amapholisa ukukhandela namkha ukuphenya ngobulelesi lobo. Odosa umtato angafihla igama lakhe.
Khumbula bona inomboro ethi-08600 10111 ngeyokubika ubulelesi.
Inomboro yokubika ngokurhaba ubulelesi nginasi-10111.
Phezulu
Amagadango okufanele alandelwe
Dosela i-08600 10111 nawufuna iPhiko lokuPheliswa kobuLelesi (i-Crime Stop) ama-awara amatjhumi nane namalanga alikhomba ngeveke.
Umngeneleli welwazi lokupheliswa kobulelesi uzakuphendula umtato wakho abe atlole phasi ilwazi elikhona. Ungakhetha ukuhlala ungaziwa.
Umngeneleli uzakunikela inomboro yefihlo ozayisebenzisa njengereferensi.

Isaziso esiqaliswe ku-Nedlac bonyana iyuniyoni namkha iyuniyoni eyongamele amayuniyoni ifuna ukunghonghoyila

Imithetho esetjenziswako

Ihlathululo

ISigaba 77 somThetho weTjhebiswano lezabaSebenzi  sinikela abasebenzi ilungelo lokuzibandakanya esenzweni sokunghonghoyila ukuthuthukisa namkha ukuvikela iinkareko zabo zokuhlalisana-nomnotho begodu sibavikela ekuqothweni emsebenzini kanye nakwesinye nesinye isenzo sokukhalima. Godu sinikela i-National Economic Development and Labour Council  – okuyihlangano eyenza imithethomgomo ebunjwa bajameli ababuya embusweni, bamabhizinisi, abasebenzi nomphakathi – umsebenzi wokuhlanganisa abathinteka embangweni ukulinga ukurarulula isenzo sokunghonghoyila.

I-Nedlac kufanele yaziswe ngesenzo sokunghonghoyila eforomini elifaneleko . Eforomini leli amabanga nobunjalo besenzo esihlosiweko kufanele abekwe. Lokhu akufaki ilanga lesenzo esihlosiweko, ngombana lokhu kungenzela phasi ikambiso yokufuna ukuvumelana.

Nayikuthi imizamo yokurarulula iyabhalelwa, iyuniyoni namkha iyuniyoni eyongamele amayuniyoni kufanele inikele ngesaziso sesibili ku-Nedlac ukuyazisa ngehloso yayo yokuragela phambili ngesenzo sokunghonghoyila. Isaziso sesibili kufanele sinikelwe i-Nedlac ubuncani bakhona amalanga ali-14 ngaphambi kwesenzo sokunghonghoyila.

Phezulu

Amagadango okufanele alandelwe

Yazisa i-Nedlac ngehloso yeyuniyoni yokuragela phambili nesenzo sokunghonghoyila.
Unobhala weyuniyoni namkha iyuniyoni eyongamele amayuniyoni kufanele izalise iforomo lesibawo, LRA 4.5.
Thumela iforomo elizalisiweko ku:
Executive Director
Nedlac
P.O Box 443
Auckland Park
2006

Labour Relations Act, 1995

Ihlathululo
Imisebenzi yokubuyisela ebujameni bangaphambilini inikelwa ebantwini abarholopheleko ukubarhelebha bona bafikelele bebagcine amazinga wabo wokusebenza. Kunamazinga amane wemisebenzi yokubuyisela ebujameni bangaphambilini eqalelele amazinga ahlukeneko wokurholophala, begodu wona nginaka:
Misebenzi yokuthoma yokubuyisela ebujameni bangaphambilini
Lizinga lesibili lokubuyisela ebujameni bangaphambilini
Lizinga lokubuyisela ebujameni bangaphambilini esikhungweni esisebenza lokho
Kubuyisela ebujameni bangaphambilini okwenziwa sisazi namkha ngokomkhumbulo
Imisebenzi yokubuyisela ebujameni bangaphambilini misebenzi yokukhandela eyakha ukuzithemba nekghono leklayenti. Lokhu kufaka irhelebho lezengqondo, imisebenzi esemakhaya, iinqhema zokusekela nokuzirhelebha, kanye namahlelo wokwazi newokusekela.
Izinga lesibili lokubuyiselwa ebujameni bangaphambilini kungenelela ekuthomeni (itlhogomelo nokuvikela, engakavunyelwa) misebenzi efaka iinkulumo-fundiswano zokuvikela, itlhogomelo lemini nemisebenzi yokuvuselela, amaphrojekthi wokwenza ingeniso nokuphelisa umtlhago, ituthuko yomntwana osakhulako nemisebenzi yokuphelisa kwesikhatjhana.
Izinga lokubuyiselwa ebujameni bangaphambilini esikhungweni esisebenza lokho ifaka itlhogomelo lekuhlaleni, itlhogomelo lokukhulisa nemisebenzi yoku-adoptha, neyokwakha butjha nemisebenzi yetlhogomelo lamuva.
Ukubuyisela ebujameni bangaphambilini okwenziwa sisazi namkha ngokomkhumbulo msebenzi ofana nokuyelelisa nokubandula, ukunikela amandla, ukwenziwa komthethomgomo nehlelo kanye nerhubhululo.
Phezulu
Amagadango okufanele alandelwe
Vakatjhela isentha eseduze yethlogomelo lokuthoma lezamaphilo namkha ikliniki bona uyokuhlolwa begodu uzakudluliselwa esibhedlela lapho uzakunikelwa itjhejo lokubuyisela ebujameni bangaphambilini namkha esazini ezingeni lesibili lesikhungo namkha esibhedlela esisebenza lokhu.
Phezulu
Imithetho esetjenziswako
Phezulu
Amazinga wokusebenza nesikhathi
Kungathatha pheze iinyanga ezintathu ukusebenzana nesibawo sakho. Kobunye ubujamo abantu balinda iinyanga ezisithandathu.
Phezulu
Iindleko
Kobunye ubujamo, amaphesente ama-75 wesabelo sokurholophala athathwa njengesiquntu seendleko. Ezinye iindleko ziquntwa ngeenkghonakalisi zomuntu. Ezinye iinkghonakalisi zilinganiswa ngokuya ngokuthi ngikuphi umndeni ongakghona ukukubhadela. Zoke iindlekwezi zihluka ngokuya kwamaphrovinsi.
Phezulu
Amaforomo azaliswako
Isentha yokubuyisela ebujameni bangaphambilini namkha isentha yetlhogomelo lokuthoma lezamaphilo iqunta ngamaforomo okufanele azaliswe.

Ihlathululo
Lomsebenzi usebenza emuntwini othathwa njengombaleki eSewula Afrika. Iimbawo zingenziwa kwelinye nelinye i-ofisi leeNdaba zeKhaya eliseduze ephrovinsini ohlala kiyo. Kufanele ube neminyaka emihlanu yobujamo oburagela phambili bombaleki ngenarheni nawuzakwenza isibawo.
Phezulu
Amagadango okufanele alandelwe
Fumana isiqinisekiso esibuya eKomitini yaSafuthi yeeNdaba zabaBaleki esibeka bona ungahle uhlale umbaleki unomphela.
Letha incwadi yesifungo mayelana nawo woke amagama asetjenziswa nguwe.
Zalisa amaforomo wesibawo.

Ihlathululo
Iphaspoti yomntwana mtlolo otlhogeka lokha umntwana nakavakatjhela kwenye inarha. Iphaspoti yomntwana inikelwa abantwana beSewula Afrika abangaphasi kweminyaka eli-16. Isebenza nawuvakatjhela kizo zoke iinarha ngaphandle kwalokha kubekwe ngenye indlela. Isebenza isikhathi seminyaka emihlanu ukuthoma ngelanga eyakhutjhwa ngalo.
Phezulu
Amagadango okufanele alandelwe
Letha iinthombe zamuva nje zephaspoti.
Imvumo yabo bobabili ababelethi nabondli iyafuneka ngaphambi kobana umntwana anikelwe iphaspoti.
Veza isitifikhethi sokuhlongakala nayikuthi munye wababelethi uhlongakele.
Lapho imvumo inikelwa mumondli, ubujamo bomondli kufanele buvezwe.
Ngaphasi kobujamo obukhethekileko, (ukungabikhona kombelethi) lokha nakukghonekako bona umbelethi anikele imvumo eforomini lesibawo, imvumo etloliweko eyincwadi kufanele itholakale embelethini ongekho.
Nayikuthi umbelethi uyala ukunikela imvumo, ikhotho enamandla kufanele iqunte indaba. Ikhophi yomlayo ofaneleko wekhotho kufanele iphekelele iforomo lesibawo sephaspoti.
Nayikuthi ababelethi bahlukanisile, imvumo yabo bobabili ababelethi iyafuneka ngaphandle kwalokha ikhotho nayibeka ngenye indlela (isibonelo, ubondli bomuntu munye bunikelwe umbelethi munye).

Ihlathululo

Ikoloyi ilayisense yayo ejanyisiweko, yasulwa, yetjiwa namkha eyakhiwe butjha namkha yatjhugululwa ifuna ilayisense etja. Lokhu kusebenza nalokha nakutjhugululwa ubunikazi namkha ikoloyi ithengwa elifeni lohlongakeleko.

Ilayisense yekoloyi isebenza isikhathi esiziinyanga ezili-12.

Phezulu

Amagadango okufanele alandelwe

Thintana ne-ofisi yethrafigi eseduze.
Zalisa iforomo lesibawo e-ofisini eliseduze lethrafigi.
Letha:

iNcwadi kaMazisi eyamukelekako
isitifikhethi sokufaneleka ukuba sendleleni sekoloyi esifunyenwe estetjhini sokuhlola iinkoloyi
iSitifikheti sokuVunyelwa ukuba seNdleleni esibuya emaPholiseni weSewula Afrika 
incwadi yokuGunyaza ebuya kwa-SABS 
isitifikhethi sokuhlongakala sohlongakeleko .



Bhadela imali ebekiweko.

Tjheja: Imali ebhadelwako esalele emva kufanele ibhadelwe eenkoloyini eziphelelwe malayisense nangakavuselelwa.

Phezulu

Imithetho esetjenziswako



National Road Traffic Act, 1996

Ihlathululo

Ukuhlukaniswa okukhethekileko kweenkoloyi ezithileko kunikelwa imihlobo ethileko yeenkoloyi efeza umnqopho othileko begodu nevamise ukungasebenzi endleleni yomphakathi.

Ikoloyana namkha itregere ibekelwa ngeqadi eemalini zamalayisense nayikuthi umnikazi wekoloyi mlimi wamambala begodu ikoloyi isetjenziselwa khulu imisebenzi yokulima yomlimi loyo. Lokhu kusafana nalokha ikoloyi itjhugululwa, yakhiwe butjha namkha itjhugululelwe ukusetjenziselwa khulu iminqopho yokureyisisa namkha yomqaliso.

Phezulu

Amagadango okufanele alandelwe

Zalisa iforomo lesibawo, i-EFL 1 e-ofisini eliseduze lethrafigi.
Letha imitlolo elandelako:

iNcwadi kaMazisi
isitifikhethi sokutloliswa kwekoloyi
incwadi yokugunyaza ebuya kwa-South African Bureau of Standards
isitifikhethi sokufaneleka ukuba sendleleni sekoloyi ethintekako.


Phezulu

Imithetho esetjenziswako



National Road Traffic Act, 1996

Ihlathululo

Lomsebenzi ungowabantu namkha iinhlangano ezifuna ukutlolisa ikhaya labadala.

Phezulu

Amagadango okufanele alandelwe

Zalisa iforomo lesibawo ema-ofisini wezokuThuthukiswa komPhakathi aseduze nawe.
Zalisa iforomo lelo phambi kwesiphathiswa somNyango wezokuThuthukiswa komPhakathhi.
Thola irasidi nawukhambisa amaforomo uyibeke izokuba sitjengiso sokobana wenze isibawo.
Nangabe isibawo sakho asikaphumeleli, uzakwaziswa ngomtlolo unobangela wokungaphumeleli kwaso.
Nangabe awuvumelani nesiqunto esithethweko, ungabawa ukudluliselwa kuNgqongqotjhe wezokuThuthukiswa komPhakathi namkha iLunga loMkhandlu oMkhulu i-MEC ema-ofisini womNyango wesitjhaba namkha wamaphrovinsi ubahlathululele kobana kubayini ungavumelani nesiqunto sabo.
Bawa ukudluliswa kungakapheli amalanga ama-90 ngemva kokuthola isaziso ngemiphumela yesibawo sakho.

Phezulu

Imithetho esetjenziswako



Older Persons Act, 2006  
Aged Persons Amendment Act, 1998  
Aged Persons Act, 1967  UmThetho waBantu abaDala, 1967 

Phezulu

Amazinga wokusebenza nesikhathi

Kungathatha iimveke ezine ukusebenzana nesibawo sakho.

Isisebenzi sezehlalakuhle sizakumema abadlalindima abanjengabezamaphilo kunye neemphathiswa zikarhulumende wendawo bona bahlolisise indawo eyokwakhiwa kiyo leyo.

Abadlalindima bazakutlola ngamunye ngamunye umbiko ngalokho akutholileko.

Imibiko yabo izakuthunyelwa ema-ofisini wezokuThuthukiswa komPhakathi aseduze nawe.


Phezulu

Iindleko

Iindleko zokutlolisa ziya ngokubakhona kweensetjenziswa begodu kuyahlukahluka ngokuya ngamaphrovinsi.
Ukuhlolwa kwekhaya lelo kwenziwa simahla.

Phezulu

Amaforomo azaliswako

Amaforomo wokwenza isibawo atholakala ema-ofisini wezokuThuthukiswa komPhakathi aseduze nawe.

Ihlathululo

Umtjhado wesintu wenziwa ngaphasi komthetho wesintu. Lokha umyeni nakatjhada nomma ngaphasi komthetho ongafuni isondo begodu aqunta ukuthatha abomma abadlula munye, abanye abomma bazakuwela ngaphasi komthetho wesintu.

Nawufuna ilwazi elinabileko, yiya ku-website yo mNyango weeNdaba zeKhaya.

Top

Amagadango okufanele alandelwe

Umtjhado kufanele kukhulunyiswane ngawo, uthatjelwe bewenziwe ngokuya komthetho wesintu.
Ababawi abahlala eendaweni zemakhaya kufanele baveze incwadi ebuya emrholini wendabuko.
Ababawi abahlala eendaweni zemadorobheni kufanele baveze incwadi yesifungo.
Umtjhado nawuzakubanjwa, abathintekako okungabatjhadako kanye nabofakazi ababuya komunye nomunye umndeni kufanele babe khona.

Ihlathululo

Izakhamuzi zeSewula Afrika namkha izakhamuzi ezinemvumo yakanomphela ezifuna ukutjhugulula ama-adresi wazo wokuhlala neweposo kufanele zenze iimbawo kwelinye nelinye i-ofisi leeNdaba zeKhaya. Iimbawo godu zingenziwa ebuzendeni namkha emitjhini yeSewula Afrika nawungaphetjheya.

Phezulu

Amagadango okufanele alandelwe

Tlola incwadi bewuyifeksele kwelinye nelinye i-ofisi leeNdaba zeKhaya.
Nakungasinjalo, zalisa iforomo lesibawo BI-4 bewunamathisele ikhophi yencwadi yokuzazisa.
Veza incwadi yokuzazisa esebenzako yeSewula Afrika enebhakhowudi namkha isitifikhethi samabeletho lokha nawenza isibawo.

Ihlathululo

Obhadela umthelo kasolanga angahlathululwa ngendlela elandelako:

ngomunye nomunye umuntu  owenza ingeniso, ngaphandle komrholo
ngomunye nomunye umnqophisi wekampani, nayikuthi umnqophisi wekampani leyo sisakhamuzi seSewula Afrika – ngaphandle kwalokha uKomitjhana we-South African Revenue Service  alaya ngenye indlela
ngelinye nelinye ilunga le-close corporation nayikuthi ilunga elinjalo limhlali weSewula Afrika – ngaphandle kobana uKomitjhana alaya ngenye indlela
ngenye nenye ikampani
ngomunye nomunye umuntu owaziswa nguKomitjhana bona umbhadeli-mthelo kasolanga.

Lapho ikampani ingakadosi umthelo womsebenzi emrholweni womnqophisi, umnqophisi akakavunyelwa ukuthatha ukubhadelwa komthelo okunjalo nakaqunta ngesikolodo somthelo kasolanga.

Umuntu onesikolodo somthelo kasolanga kufanele kungakapheli amalanga ama-30 wokukoloda, enze isibawo ngomtlolo sokuzitlolisa e-ofisini legatja le-SARS eliseduze. Ukubhalelwa kukwenza njalo kuzakuba nomphumela wenzuzo nehlawulo ekubhadeleni kwangemva kwesikhathi nokulethwa sekudlule isikhathi kwamaforomo.

Abantu abalandelako akufuneki bona babhadele umthelo kasolanga:

omunye nomunye umuntu ingeniso yakhe efunyanwa kuphela ngomrholo
omunye nomunye umuntu ingeniso yakhe engadluli ubunengi bomthelo. Omunye nomunye umuntu ingeniso yakhe engadluli ubunengi bomthelo oyi-R43 000 ebantwini abangaphasi kweminyaka ema-65, kuthi i-R69 000 ebantwini abangaphezu kweminyaka ema-65
omunye nomunye umuntu ngaphandle kwengeniso efunyanwa emrholweni, ofumana ingeniso yamasiso engadluli i-R18 000 ebantwini abangapahsi kweminyaka ema-65 namkha i-R26 000 ebantwini abaneminyaka engaphezu kwama-65. Inzuzo yangaphandle nemali efunyanwa ngamasiso ayifakwa kuphela ukufika ku-R3 000 ekubekweni ngaphandle kwesibalo
omunye nomunye umuntu oneminyaka ema-65 namkha ngaphezulu ubekelwa ngeqadi ekubhadeleni umthelo kasolanga nayikuthi:

ingeniso etheliswako yakhe yonyaka weemali ayidluli i-R80 000 begodu ibunjwa mrholo, ipentjhini, imali ebhadelwa ngokusisa namkha ingeniso yerente begodu
akasi mnqophisi wekampani yangeqadi namkha lilunga le-close corporation begodu
akasenzi ibhizinisi.


ImiHlahlandlela ye-IRP 12 Guidelines inelwazi elinengi ngesihlokwesi.

Phezulu

Amagadango okufanele alandelwe

Letha isibawo sokutloliswa njengobhadela umthelo kasolanga e-ofisini legatja le-SARS eliseduze ngencwadi. Incwadi kufanele ibeke ilanga othoma ngalo ukubhadela ukwenzela iminqopho yomThelo kaSolanga.

Isibawo sokulahlwa kobakhamuzi beSewula Afrika

Ihlathululo
Amagadango okufanele alandelwe
Imithetho esetjenziswako
Amazinga wokusebenza nesikhathi

Ihlathululo

AmaSewula Afrika ahlose ukwenza isibawo sobakhamuzi benye inarha engavumeli ubakhamuzi obubili, kufanele enze isibawo sokulahla ubakhamuzi beSewula Afrika. Lokhu kutjho bona umbawi uzakugcina ukuba sisakhamuzi seSewula Afrika ukuthoma ngesikhathi kuvunywa isibawo. Abantwana abasese bancani nabo bazakulahlekelwa kukuba zizakhamuzi zeSewula Afrika ngaphandle kobana omunye wababelethi ahlale asisakhamuzi seSewula Afrika.

Phezulu

Amagadango okufanele alandelwe

Zalisa amaforomo weembawo BI-246, BI-529 no BI-9 kwelinye nelinye i-ofisi leeNdaba zeKhaya. Yenza isibawo ebuzendeni namkha imitjhini yeSewula Afrika nawungaphetjheya.
Letha zoke iincwadi zokuzazisa zeSewula Afrika  e-ofisini leeNdaba zeKhaya, ubuzenda namkha imitjhini.
Veza iinthombe ezimbili zakamazisi.

Phezulu

Imithetho esetjenziswako



South African Citizenship Act, 1995  

Phezulu

Isibawo sithatha iimveke ezibunane ukuya kwezilitjhumi nambili.

Awubhadeli litho ngalomsebenzi.

Ihlathululo
Lomsebenzi ngewabantu abaneemvumo abahlose ukungezelela isikhathi namkha ukutjhugulula iimvumo zokusebenza. Isibawo sokungezelela namkha sokutjhugulula kufanele senziwe iimveke ezibunane ngaphambi kokuphela kwemvumo. Iimvumo eziphelelwe sikhathi angeze zangezelelwa.

letha ikhophi yesivumelwano sangokomthetho sokuqatjhwa letha, nabufunekako, ubufakazi bokutloliswa nehlangano efaneleko yabafundele umsebenzi letha ikomba yamaqhinga wangomuso wombawi letha iinkhangiso zesikhundla, nayikuthi isikhathi sesivumelwano sokuthoma sokuqatjhwa sangezelelwa letha umbiko weragelo phambili oqinisekisa bona izakhamuzi zeSewula Afrika namkha abahlali bakanomphela babanduliwe namkha bayabandulwa.

Isibawo selungelo lokumayina

Ihlathululo
Amagadango okufanele alandelwe
Imithetho esetjenziswako
Amazinga wokusebenza nesikhathi
Iindleko
Amaforomo azaliswako
Imininingwana yokuthintana

Ihlathululo

Ilungelo lokumayina yimvumo enikelwa nguRhulumende ngokusebenzisa umNyango wamaMinerali namaNdla elikunikela igunya lokumayina amaminerali endaweni ethileko.

Ilungelo lokumayina angeze ladlula isikhathi seminyaka ema-30.

Ilungelo lokumayina linikelwa nayikuthi:

iminerali lingamayinwa kuhle
umbawi uneemali nelewazi lokwenza umsebenzi wokumayina okuhlongozwako kuhle
iqhinga leemali likhambisana nomsebenzi ohlosiweko wokumayina kanye nesikhathi sawo.
akunakusilaphazeka kwebhoduluko okwamukelekako namkha umonakalo ebhodulukweni ozakwenzeka ngebanga lomsebenzi wokumayina.
umbawi wenze iinjamiso zeemali kanye nezinye eqhingeni elibekiweko lezokuhlalisana nelabasebenzi.
umbawi akaphuli umThetho wokuThuthukiswa kwemiThombo yamaMinerali nePhethroliyamu .
umsebenzi ukhambisana neTjhata yeeMayini.

Nawufuna ilwazi elinabileko, yiya ku-website yomNyango wamaMinerali namaNdla

Top

Amagadango okufanele alandelwe

Yenza isibawo e-ofisini kuMphathi wesiFunda womNyango wamaMinerali namaNdla esifundeni inarha ekiso.
Zalisa iForomo D: Application for a mining right  elitholakala e-ofisini loMphathi wesiFunda. Iforomo godu lingatholakala ku-inthanethi ekhasini leli.
Letha iforomo ngesandla namkha ngeposo etlolisiweko kuMphathi wesiFunda inarha ewela ngaphasi kwaso.
Iforomo kufanele liphekelelwe yimali yesibawo engabuyiko ezakuquntwa Mphathi wesiFunda.
Nayikuthi uMphathi wesiFunda wamukela isibawo, kufanele akwazise kungakapheli amalanga ali-14 wokwamukelwa kwesibawo:

Ukuletha ihlelo lokuphathwa kwebhoduluko elizakuvunywa

Azise abe abonisane nabo boke abathintekako nabanekareko kungakapheli amalanga ali-180 ukuthoma ngelanga lesaziso.



Top

Imithetho esetjenziswako

Mineral and Petroleum Resources Development Act, 2002  

Mineral and Petroleum Resources Development Regulations – Government Gazette No. 26275  
Broad Based Socio Economic Empowerment Charter for the South African Mining Industry 

Top

Amazinga wokusebenza nesikhathi

UMphathi wesiFunda uzakwazisa ngomtlolo nayikuthi isibawo samukelwe, lokhu kutjho bona isibawo sakho sikhambisene nazo zoke iimfuno kungakapheli amalanga ali-14 wokufunyanwa kwesibawo begodu uzakulaya bona ubonisane nomnikazi wenarha, ohlala kiyo kanye nabo boke abathintekako.
Nayikuthi isibawo asiphumeleli, uMphathi wesiFunda uzakubuyisela kuwe isibawo kungakapheli amalanga ali-14.
Nayikuthi uNgqongqotjhe uyala ukunikela ilungelo lokumayina, kufanele akwazise ngomtlolo, kungakapheli amalanga ama-30, abeke amabanga wokwala.

Top

Iindleko

Iindleko zizakuquntwa mnyango begodu azibuyi.
Inani lizakuhluka ngokuya kweminerali elizakwenjiwa.

Top

Amaforomo azaliswako

Form D: Application for a mining right

Ihlathululo

Abanikeli-bandulo kufanele baqunte bona mhlobo bani webandulo abangalinikela. Kufanele kube bavunyelwe siKhungo sokuLawulwa kweFundo neBandulo   ngaphambi kobana bathome ngebandulo. Abanikeli-bandulo nabaqatjhi kufanele babambisane ukuthoma ama-learnership.

Nawufuna ilwazi elinabileko, yiya ku-website yomNyango wezabaSebenzi.

Top

Amagadango okufanele alandelwe

Abanikeli-bandulo kufanele baqunte bona ngimaphi ama-learnership abanganikela ibandulo kiwo.
Abanikeli-bandulo kufanele bavunyelwe yi-SETA. Abanikeli-bandulo abangakavunyelwa abavunyelwa ukufezakalisa ama-learnership.
Ukuvunyelwa, umnikeli-bandulo kufanele

athuthukise ikharikhyulamu ye-learnership ngokuya kwamazinga we-South African Qualifications Authority ;
balandele imikghwa efaneleko yefundo, ibandulo nokuthuthukisa; begodu
nokuzitlolisa njenge-Education and Training Development Practitioner .

Nasele abanikeli-bandulo bakhethe i-learnership, kufanele bathole abaqatjhi abazakunikela abafundi ngelemuko lokwenza.
Abanikeli-bandulo nabaqatjhi abazakunikela ngelemuko lokwenza okuvunyelwene ngalo

ekuthini bangaki abafundi abazakubandulwa;
indlela yokukhetha abafundi; kanye
nokuthi bazabathola njani abafundi.

Abafundi kungaba basebenzi asele baqatjhwe bomqatjhi namkha abantu abangasebenziko. Thintana nesentha yezabasebenzi eseduze ukuthola bona umNyango wezabaSebenzi ungakurhelebha njani ukufumana abafundi abangasebenziko.
Abaqatjhi, abanikeli-bandulo nabafundi kufanele batlikitle isivumelwano se-learnership.
Abanikeli-bandulo kufanele bathome ibandulo ngelanga okuvunyelwene ngalo esivumelwaneni se-learnership.

Basic Conditions of Employment Act, 1997 , Sectoral Determination No 5)

Ukuzitlolisa okukhethekileko njengososayensi wesiphrofetjhinali wemvelo – Ukuvunywa kwefundo nelemuko langaphambilini
Ihlathululo
Amagadango okufanele alandelwe
Imithetho esetjenziswako
Amazinga wokusebenza nesikhathi
Iindleko
Amaforomo azaliswako
Imininingwana yokuthintana

Ihlathululo

I-South African Council for Natural Scientific Professions  ivuma iqiniso lokobana abanye abantu bebanganamathuba wokufumana ifundo yezinga eliphezulu efunwa mKhandlu nawuzazitlolisa ngokwesiphrofetjhinali. Kodwana, abantu abanjalo kungenzeka bafaka isandla esikhulu emphakathini wesayensi esikhathini esiminyaka eminengi begodu bangaragela phambili nokwenza njalo eminye iminyaka eminengi ezako.

UmKhandlu uqunte ukunikela abantu abanjalo ithuba lokwenza iimbawo zokuzitlolisa njengaboSosayensi besiPhrofetjhinali bemVelo ngaphasi kobujamo obuthileko.

Omunye nomunye umuntu onganakho ukufaneleka okuvunywe mKhandlu angenza isibawo.

Abenzi beembawo kufanele:

bahlonitjhwe basebenzisani babo ngelwazi labo ebizelweni abalikhethileko abasebenza kilo
kube bafake isandla emphakathini wesayensi
ubuncani bakhona kube banelemuko eliragela phambili, elifaneleko nelesiphrofetjhinali leminyaka eli-10 msinyana ngaphambi kokwenza isibawo ezikweni lokusebenza okwenziwa isibawo kilo.

Tjheja: Nayikuthi utjhiye ibizelo lakho ngesikhathi seminyaka elitjhumi, angeze wavunyelwa ukuzitlolisa ngaphasi kwalekambiso.

Ukuhlolwa kweembawo kuzakwenziwa yiKomiti yokuYelelisa yesiPhrofetjhinali, kuvunywe yiKomiti yokuTlolisa ye-SACNASP begodu kugunyazwe mKhandlu ozeleko.

Phezulu

Amagadango okufanele alandelwe

Zalisa iforomo lesibawo nawuzazitlolisa.
Letha iforomo elitlikitliweko kanye nemitlolo onikela ngefundo nelemuko onalo:

ubufakazi bebandulo elifaneleko nelingakahleleki – amakhophi aqinisekisiweko wedigri namkha i-diploma, amarekhodi weemfundo walokhu kufaneleka
irekhodi elingeneleleko lelemuko elifaneleko ezikweni lokusebenza njengombana belisetjenziswa
irhemo lemitlolo eveziweko
ubufakazi bobulunga beenhlangano zabafundileko, isibonelo, i-South African Association for Food Science and Technology; South African Chemical Institute ; ne-Geological Society of South Africa .

Ubuncani bakhona imibiko emithathu ezeleko  oyibuthelele namkha ofake isandla khulu kiyo. Nayikuthi awukwazi ukuyiletha lemibiko ngebanga lokuba yifihlo, ukufaka isandla kufanele kwenziwe kuqinisekiswe.
Incwadi yesifungo etjho bona lo msebenzi wakho begodu necacisa indima oyidlalileko emibikweni elethwako.
Incwadi yesifungo yaboreferi ababili abangaqinisekisa amakghono nelwazi lakho ezikweni lokusebenza.

Phezulu

Imithetho esetjenziswako



Natural Scientific Professions Act, 2003  

Phezulu

Amazinga wokusebenza nesikhathi

Ukutlolisa kungathatha iimveke ezisi-6 ukuya kwezi-8 kuye ngokulethwa kwemitlolo efunekako.
Isiqhema ubuncani bakhona sabantu ababili esikhethwe yiKomiti yokuYelelisa yesiPhrofetjhinali ye-SACNASP Professional Advisory Committee  sizakukhulumisana nawe.
Umphumela wokuhlola uzakwaziswa ngemva komhlangano womKhandlu.

Ihlathululo
Umnqopho wokuPhuhlisa ukuFikelela iLwazi kuqinisekisa bona abantu basebenzisa ilungelo labo lomthethosisekelo lokufikelela elinye nelinye ilwazi eliphethwe ngurhulumende, kanye nelwazi eliphethwe ngomunye nomunye umuntu, elifuneka ekusebenziseni namkha ekuvikeleni elinye nelinye ilungelo. Ibanga lokusetjenziswa kwelungelo lokufikelela ilwazi kuphuhlisa isiko lokwenzelwa kwezinto emkhanyweni kanye nokuziphendulela eenhlanganweni zomphakathi nezangeqadi, kanye nokuphuhlisa umphakathi lapho abantu beSewula Afrika banokufikelela ilwazi okusebenzako ukubakghonakalisa ukusebenzisa ngokuzeleko nokuvikela amalungelo woke wabo.
Ungafumana ukufikelela liphi ilwazi eliphethwe mNyango wezobuLungiswa nokuThuthukiswa komThethosisekelo namkha ngenye nenye ihlangano yomphakathi?
Ungafumana ukufikelela yoke imitlolo namarekhodi aphethwe mNyango, iimphathiswa zawo namkha ihlangano yomphakathi. Akukanandaba bona ilwazi lithome ukubakhona nini. Ilwazi lifaka:
Amarekhodi wabantu aphethwe mNyango namkha ihlangano yomphakathi.
Ilwazi lowesithathu othintekako namkha amarekhodi: onemvumo kuphela ebuya kowesithathu othintekako, khulukhulu nayikuthi imitlolo iphethe ilwazi eliyifihlo namkha okungelangeqadi.
Ilwazi ukufikelelwa kilo okuqintelwe mThetho wokuPhuhliswa kokuFikelelwa kweLwazi. Ukufikelela ilwazi kuqintelwe ngaphasi kobujamo obuthileko, isibonelo:
lokha irekhodi nalibawiwa bona lisetjenziselwe ubulelesi namkha eenkambisweni zemibango ekhotho lokha ikambiso yobulelesi namkha yombango sele ithonyiwe, lapho ilwazi lingeze lasetjenziswa yikhotho yomthetho, khulukhulu nayikuthi ikhotho icabanga bona kuzakuba nomphumela omumbi ekambisweni yobulungiswa.
Amarekhodi akhambelana nomsebenzi wezomthetho wekhotho.
Ilwazi elifunyenwe yikundla ekhethekileko ehlonywe ngokuya komthetho.
Ilwazi eliphethwe siphathiswa sezomthetho sekundla enjalo namkha ikhotho.
Ilwazi eliphethwe mumuntu olilunga lepalamende namkha lesibethamthetho sephrovinsi.
Kodwana, umThetho wokuPhuhliswa kokuFikelelwa kweLwazi ungaphezu kwananyana ngimuphi umthetho ongakukhandela ekufikeleleni ilwazi.
Phezulu
Amagadango okufanele alandelwe
Bawa iSekela lesiPhathiswa sokwAzisa (Deputy Information Officer) lomnyango wombuso ofaneleko likurhelebhe ukufikelela ilwazi namkha imitlolo oyifunako.
Nayikuthi ilwazi olifunako alitholakali simahla, uzakubhadela imali yesibawo eziintempe zokungenisa imali revenue stamps. Godu ungabhadela imali yokufikelela nokuzuma qala itjhejuli yeemali ngenzasi.
Phezulu
Imithetho esetjenziswako
Phezulu
Amazinga wokusebenza nesikhathi
Nayikuthi isiPhathiswa sokwAzisa sikwalela nemvumo yokufikelela ilwazi olibawileko, dlulisela phambili isiqunto kuNgqongqotjhe womNyango wezobuLungiswa nokuThuthukiswa komThethosisekelo.
Nayikuthi nalapho awaneliswa mphumela, dlulisela phambili isiqunto ekhotho yezomthetho. ISekela lesiPhathiswa sokwAzisa lizakurhelebha ngekambiso.
Nayikuthi ilwazi olibawako alikaphathwa mnyango womBuso, kodwana yihlangano yomphakathi, iSekela lesiPhathiswa sokwAzisa lizakudlulisela isibawo sakho esiPhathisweni sokwAzisa sehlangano efaneleko kungakapheli amalanga ali-14.
Ihlangano yomphakathi efaneleko kufanele iphendule isibawo sakho esikhathini esizwakalako. Uzakwaziswa nakungenzeka lokhu.

Kwenye nenye ifothokhophi yekhasi le-A4 namkha isiquntu salo
Kwenye nenye ikhophi egadangisiweko yekhasi le-A4 namkha isiquntu sayo, esekhompyutheni namkha ngokwe-elektroniki namkha ngendlela efundwa mtjhini
Ekutlolweni kwemibono yeentjengiso ekhasini le-A4 namkha isiquntu salo

Ihlathululo

Ngaphasi kwesiVumelwano samaTjhebiswano wezobuZenda saka-1963  – izinga elamukeleka khulu kizo zoke iinarha, abantu ababotjhwa ngaphandle kwenarha yabo kufuze babe nokufikelela umjameli wabo wezobuzenda. AmaSewula Afrika akilobu bujamo kufuze msinyana abawe iimphathimandla ukubavumela ukuthintana nomJameli weSewula Afrika enarheni leyo. Nakungasinjalo, omunye angathintana nomJameli weSewula Afrika enarheni leyo namkha nephiko lemiSebenzi yezobuZenda emNyangweni weeNdaba zangaPhandle ePitori, esikhundleni sawo.

IimPhathiswa zobuZenda zifuna ukuqinisekisa bona izakhamizi zeSewula Afrika ezibotjhwa ngaphetjheya ziphathwa ngokunobuntu nazisavalelweko. Kilokhu, iindaba ezifana nokuhlunguphaza, ukuphathwa ngokunganabuntu namkha ukuphathwa ngokwehliswa isithunzi namkha ukuzwisa ubuhlungu kuzakubikwa begodu kusiwe kwabasemagunyeni abafaneleko. ImiThetho esiSekelo eyAmukelekako yeHlangano yeenTjhaba eziBumbeneko yokuPhathwa kweemBotjhwa  isetjenziswa njengomhlahlandlela.

Ngimiphi imisebenzi enikelwa ziimPhathiswa zobuZenda kumaSewula Afrika angaphetjheya?

Iimphathiswa zobuzenda:

zihloma ukuthintana nesibotjhwa ngokurhaba okukghonekako ngemva kokuqinisekisa ubakhamuzi beSewula Afrika. Lokhu kukghonakalisa amaSewula Afrika abotjhiweko, namkha avalelwe ngaphasi komthetho otjhili ukuzwisisa amalungelo wabo kanye nemisebenzi enikelwa mBuso weSewula Afrika. Ngokuya kobujamo obuthileko, ukuthintana kuzakwenziwa ngenyama, ngomtlolo, ngomtato namkha ngokusebenzisa abangeneleli.
zinikela ngelwazi elijayelekileko ngerherho lezomthetho lenarha ebophako. Ilwazi lingafaka; imininingwana yerhelebho lezomthetho, irhemo lamagqwetha , ukukhalima, ibheyili kanye neenkambiso zokudluliswa kwemilandu khona isibotjhwa sizakuzwisisa amalungelo neenkambiso ezithintekako.
zigcina ukuthintana nezakhamuzi zeSewula Afrika ezibotjhwe ngaphetjheya ngesikhathi zithobela imithetho nemithetjhwana yenarha ebophako.
zivakatjhela amajele. Ukubuyeleleka kwevakatjho lejele kuyame emthethwenimgomo wanjesi, indawo, nesiko kanye nemithetho yenarha ebophako kanye nobujamo bezokuphepha obenzeka enarheni kanye nejele.
zithintana nomndeni nabangani - kuphela nayikuthi ubawiwa sibotjhwa ngomtlolo. Akunakuthintana okuzakwenziwa, namkha ilwazi elizakunikelwa omunye umuntu ngaphandle kwesivumelwano esitloliweko esenziwe sisakhamuzi seSewula Afrika esivalelweko namkha esisejele.
zikghonakalisa ukudluliswa kwemali ukusuka emndenini namkha ebanganini eSewula Afrika ukuya esibotjhweni — ukukhambisana nomthetho nemithetjhwana yomBuso weSewula Afrika kanye newenarha ebophako. Ukugunyaza okukhona kubeka bona iimali ezidluliswe ukusuka eSewula Afrika ukuthenga izinto zokuhlamba nokuzesa, ukudla kanye nezinto zomuntu ngokwakhe  angeze zadlula i-R2 000  ngenyanga. Inani angeze ladluliselwa enyangeni elandelako. Thintana nephiko lemiSebenzi yezobuZenda ukufumana irhelebho.
ziqinisekisa bona imiraro yezokwelapha yaziswa abaphathi bejele.
zikghonakalisa ukuthunyelwa nokulethwa kweencwadi, iinhlahla kanye nezinto zokufunda  ukusuka emndenini nebanganini eSewula Afrika. Ikghonakalo le izakuya ngeenjamiso neemali ezibhadelwako ezikhona emNyangweni weeNdaba zangaPhandle kanye nemithetho nemithetjhwana enarheni ebophako. Iimali ezibhadelwako zingalethwa ebujameni banjesi ngokuya kwesikhathi.

Tjheja bona:

UmNyango weeNdaba zangaPhandle kanye nabaJameli beSewula Afrika ngaphetjheya wenza yoke imizamo ukuqinisekisa bona imali, iincwadi izinto zokufunda kanye neenhlahla zidluliswa ngaphandle kokumoswa kwesikhathi. Kodwana, kokusebenza okubekwe phambili buZenda, iKomijhini ePhakamileko  namkha i-Consulate kubekwa phambili. Ubujamo bendawo enarheni nabo budlala indima.

Iimphathiswa ze-Consular angeze zanikela ngemisebenzi elandelako kumaSewula Afrika abotjhiweko:

ukuthoma namkha ukungenelela eenkambisweni zekhotho namkha eenkambisweni zomthetho

ukufumana namkha ukunikela ngesiyeleliso sezomthetho

ukuhlela ukutjhatjhululwa ejele namkha ibheyili

ukukhambela iindawo eziyingozi namkha amajele

ukuphenya ubulelesi

ukufumana ukuphathwa ngcono ejele kunalokho okunikelwa izakhamuzi zekhaya — ngaphandle kwalokha imithetho esisekelo eyamukelekako yehlangano yeentjhaba ezibumbeneko yokuphathwa kweembotjhwa ingasetjenziswa khona

ukulaya isihlobo namkha umngani ukudlulisa imali

ukubhadela, iinkolodo zomthetho, zokwelatjhwa namkha ezinye

ukufumana indawo yokuhlala, umsebenzisa ama-visa namkha iimvumo zokuhlala

ukwenza umsebenzi owenziwa basebenzeli bezokukhamba, iimphaphamtjhini, amabhanka namkha amakamapni arentisa iinkoloyi

ukurhelebha kuhle izakhamuzi ezinobakhamuzi obubili enarheni ngobuzwe babo besibili

ukubhadela ukulungiswa, ukuthuthwa, ukubulungwa namkha ukubulungwa ngokutjhiswa zeensalela zokuhlongakala kwesakhamuzi seSewula Afrika esihlongakeleko.


Phezulu

Amagadango okufanele alandelwe

Nayikuthi ubotjhwa ngaphetjheya, thintana nomJameli weSewula Afrika namkha Consular emNyangweni weeNdaba wezengaPhandle ePitori.

Abantu abanobakhamuzi obubili ababotjhwa enarheni enye abanobakhamuzi bayo angeze bafumana irhelebho elibuya kubaJameli beSewula Afrika. Nayikuthi abantu abanobakhamuzi obubili babotjhwa kwenye inarha, abangasi sisakhamuzi sayo, ngesikhathi bakhamba ngephaspoti yenarha yabo yobakhamuzi besibili, kufuze bathintane nomjameli we-consular wenarha abekakhamba ngephaspoti yayo.


Phezulu

Imithetho esetjenziswako

Article 36 of the Vienna Convention on Consular Relations . 
AkunasiVumelwano sokuDluliswa kweemBotjhwa esikhona hlangana kweSewula Afrika nezinye iinarha.

Phezulu

Amazinga wokusebenza nesikhathi

Amazinga womsebenzi aquntwa ngokuya kobujamo bomlandu ngamunye begodu ayame ebujameni benarha umuntu abotjhwa kiyo.

Phezulu

Iindleko

UmNyango weeNdaba zangaPhandle uqunta iindleko lapho kufaneleko, ngokuya kwemisebenzi enikelwako.

Phezulu

Amaforomo azaliswako

UmJameli weSewula Afrika unikela isibotjhwa amaforomo wesibawo afaneleko.

Ihlathululo

Imvumo yomuntu othethe umhlalaphasi inikelwa iphandle elihlose ukuthatha umhlalaphasi liseSewula Afrika.

Phezulu

Amagadango okufanele alandelwe

Veza ubufakazi bengeniso ubuncani bakhona eziinkulungwana ezimatjhumi amabili nahlanu  ngenyanga ebuya esikhwameni somhlalaphasi namkha emalini etholwa ngonyaka engasulwako namkha emalini esalako ingabi ngaphasi kweengidi ezili-15 nasele kudoswe umthelo.
Nakungenzeka umbawi afise ukusebenza, kufanele aveze bona asikho isakhamuzi namkha umhlali wakanompheka weSewula Afrika owufunako umsebenzi lowo.
Veza isivumelwano sokuqatjhwa sehlangano ozayisebenzela nayo yoke imininingwana etlhogekako ngehlangano.
Letha isitifikhethi sokuhlatjelwa umgomani osarulana nayikuthi khewakhamba namkha uhlose ukukhamba ukusuka namkha ukudlula endaweni enomgomani osarulana. Isitifikhethi angeze safunwa lokha nabewukhamba namkha bewuhlose ukukhamba ngokudlula bunqopha endaweni enjalo namkha lapho isibawo senziwa eSewula Afrika.
Bhadela idibhozidi. Idibhozidi enjalo angeze yabuyiselwa kodibhozidileko ngemva kokusuka kwakho kokugcina namkha ngemva kobana unikelwe imvumo. Ukubhadelwa kwedibhozidi kungenziwa ngetjhege eqinisekiswe ebhanka namkha ikarada lokuthenga ngesikolodo eendaweni lapho isikghonakalisi sikhona.
Veza isitifikhethi sokuvunyelwa samapholisa, imibiko yezokwelatjhwa neyeradiyoloji. Akutlhogeki bona abantwana abangaphasi kweminyaka eli-12 nabomma abasidisi babe nemibiko yeradiyoloji.

Phezulu

Imithetho esetjenziswako



Immigration Act, 2002

Ihlathululo

I-visa siqinisekiso esifakwa ephaspotini esebenzako yephandle, enikela iphandle igunya lokungena eSewula Afrika.

I-visa kufanele:

ifunyanwe ngaphambi kobana umbawi atjhiye inarha yakhe eze eSewula Afrika
ifunyanwe ngaphetjheya begodu angeze yabawiwa eendaweni zokungena ngenarheni eSewula Afrika
ibawiwe ebuzendeni namkha emitjhini yeSewula Afrika eenarheni lapho iSewula Afrika ijanyelwe khona
ibawiwe ebuzendeni obuseduze namkha imitjhini nayikuthi iSewula Afrika ayikajanyelwa enarheni yakho. Lokhu kusebenza kubanikazi bamaphaspoti wabosomaqhinga newangokomthetho abafuna iimvumo zabosomaqhinga.

Phezulu

Amagadango okufanele alandelwe

zalisa iforomo lesibawo se-visa, BI-84
iphaspoti yakho kufanele isebenze isikhathi esingasi ngaphasi kwamalanga ama-30 ngemva kokuphela kwevakatjho elihlosiweko
iphaspoti yakho kufanele ubuncani bakhona ibe nekhasi linye elingakasetjenziswa nawuyikhuphela bona iqinisekisiwe
imali ebhadelwako kufanele ibhadelwe, nayikuthi iyafuneka
isitifikhethi sokuhlatjelwa silethwe, nasifunekako
letha istatimende namkha umtlolo oqinisekisa umnqopho nesikhathi sevakatjho
veza ubufakazi bekghono elaneleko leemali
veza ubufakazi bethikithi lesiphaphamtjhini elisebenzako lokubuyela emva
idibhozidi ingabawiwa.

Phezulu

Imithetho esetjenziswako



Immigration Act, 2002 , as amended

Kungathatha amalanga alitjhumi ukusebenzana nesibawo.

Ihlathululo
Imvumo yesihlobo inikelwa iphandle elililunga lomndeni oseduze wesakhamuzi namkha umhlali weSewula Afrika. Isakhamuzi esinjalo namkha umhlali kufanele anikele ngesiqinisekiso seemali. Imvumo yesihlobo isebenza ubunegi bakhona iminyaka emibili.
Phezulu
Amagadango okufanele alandelwe
Veza ubufakazi bokuba lilunga eliseduze lomndeni wesakhamuzi esisekelako namkha umhlali.
Letha isiqinisekiso esenziwe yi-chartered accountant namkha ubufakazi bomtlolo oqinisekisa ikghono losekelako lokusekela namkha ikghono lakho nokusekela losekelako. Ikghono lokusekela kufanele lingabi ngaphasi kwe-R5 000 ngenyanga emuntwini ngamunye isikhathi soke sevakatjho (alisebenzi ebujameni bothethweko namkha ebantwaneni abasese bancani).
Kungafuneka bona uveze munye namkha eminengana yalemitlolo:
Isitifikhethi sokuvunyelwa samapholisa nayikuthi uneminyaka ema-21 namkha ngaphezulu, mayelana nazo zoke iinarha lapho ukhe wahlala khona unyaka namkha isikhathi esidlula lapho, okufanele bulethwe kungakapheli iinyanga ezili-12 nabungakabi ukufumaneka.
Imibiko yezokwelatjhwa neradiyoloji mayelana nomunye nomunye umbawi. Imibiko yeradiyoloji angeze yafunwa ebantwaneni abangaphasi kweminyaka eli-12 nakibomma abasidisi.

Ihlathululo

Imvumo yamakghono angakajayeleki inikelwa iphandle elinamakghono namkha ukufaneleka okungakajayeleki. Godu inganikelwa amalunga womndeni waloyo muntu. Iimbawo zingenziwa ebuzendeni namkha emitjhini yeSewula Afrika.

Phezulu

Amagadango okufanele alandelwe

Zalisa iforomo lesibawo BI-1738.
Amaphaspoti kufanele asebenze amalanga angasi ngaphasi kwama-30 ngemva kokuphela kwelanga levakatjho elihlosiweko.
Letha i-CV ezeleko kanye nesifakazelo esibuya emqatjhini odlulileko.
Ubufakazi bekghono lokuphila lomhlobo weentatimende zebhanka, imitlolo yemirholo, nesibopho sabantu abakwamukelako eSewula Afrika, imifundalize, irhelebho lezokwelapha namkha ikhetjhe ekhona, kufaka amakarada wokuthenga ngesikolodo namkha amatjhege wabavakatjhi ukubhadela iindleko zokuphila ngesikhathi uhlala eSewula Afrika.
Isitifikhethi sokuhlatjelwa, nasifunekako.
Veza incwadi ebuya ephikweni lakarhulumende wangaphandle weSewula Afrika, namkha ebuya ehlanganweni yezefundo, zamasiko namkha yezamabhizinisi, eqinisekisa bona amakghono namkha ukufaneleka okungakajayeleki.
Veza obunye nobunye ubufakazi ukungezelela amakghono namkha ukufaneleka okungajayeleki, okufana nemitlolo eveziweko neemfakazelo.
Bawa ozakuba mqatjhi azalise isigaba 13 , , no  seforomo BI-1738.

Phezulu

Imithetho esetjenziswako



Immigration Act, 2002

Ihlathululo
Imvumo yokutjhayela yesiphrofetjhinali yenzelwe abantu okufuneka batjhayele imihlobo ethileko yeenkoloyi. Imvumo ikhutjhwa ukungezelela ilayisense ejayelekileko yokutjhayela. Imvumo yokutjhayela yesiphrofetjhinali isebenza emihlobeni elandelako yeenkoloyi:
iinkoloyi ezithutha ipahla, ikoloyi yokudosa namkha ebhesini iinkoloyi ezinesisindo esidlula i-3 500 kg nezibekelwe ukuthwala abantu abali-12 namkha ukudlula lapho (kufakwa nomtjhayeli).
Amaqintelo wobudala emahlangothini weenkoloyi angendlela elandelako:
ikoloyi ethutha ipahla - kufanele ube neminyaka eli-18 ubudala iinkoloyi ezithutha abantu - kufanele ube neminyaka ema-21 ubudala iinkoloyi eziyingozi ezithutha ipahla - kufanele ube neminyaka ema-25 ubudala.
Ungafumana kuphela imvumo yokutjhayela yesiphrofetjhinali nayikuthi:
unelayisense yokutjhayela esebenzako emhlobeni wekoloyi okukhulunywa ngawo uqinisekiswe njengomuntu ophile kuhle ngudorhodera uqinisekiswe yihlangano enikela ngebandulo evunyelweko (sifuneka kuphela emihlobeni ethileko yeenkoloyi)
awukafunyanwa unomlandu wokutjhayela usele utjwala, ukutjhayela ngokungatjheji namkha ngokungacabangeli abanye, namkha isenzo senturhu, begodu
akhenge nakanye kujanyiswe ilayisense yakho yokutjhayela.
Kugwetjwa okhunye kweminyaka emihlanu edlulileko okungenza ungafaneleki kufumana imvumo yokutjhayela yesiphrofetjhinali. Ukugwetjwa okudlula iinyanga ezihlanu angeze kwatjhejwa.
Umsebenzisi namkha umnikazi wekoloyi efunelwa imvumo yokutjhayela yesiphrofetjhinali, angeze avumela omunye umuntu atjhayele ikoloyi endleleni yomphakathi ngaphandle kwalokha anemvumo yokutjhayela yesiphrofetjhinali yehlangothi elifaneleko.
Phezulu
Amagadango okufanele alandelwe
Uzakuhlolwa amehlo esentha yokuhlola.
Khupha imitlolo elandelako:
Bhadela imali ebekiweko.
Ngemva kokubhadela, uzakudluliselwa estetjhini esiseduze samapholisa uyokubawa umbiko wokubanjwa.
Uzakwaziswa nasele imvumo yakho yokutjhayela yesiphrofetjhinali ilungile bona uzoyithatha. Kufanele ukghone ukuzazisa lokha nawuthatha ikarada. Amanye namanye amakarada angakathathwa kungakapheli amalanga ali-120 azakumotjhwa.

Isibawo sokunikelwa kwephandle ubakhamuzi

Amazinga wokusebenza nesikhathi

Ihlathululo

Omunye nomunye onemvumo yokuhlala yakanomphela yeSewula Afrika uyafaneleka kukwenza isibawo sobakhamuzi beSewula Afrika ngokunikelwa kwephandle ubakhamuzi ngemva kweminyaka emihlanu yokuba mhlali kanomphela.

Omunye nomunye umuntu otjhada isakhamuzi seSewula Afrika ufaneleka kunikelwa ubakhamuzi njengephandle iminyaka emibili ngemva kokunikelwa imvumo yokuhlala yakanomphela ngesikhathi atjhada.

Umntwana ongaphasi kweminyaka ema-21 onemvumo yobakhamuzi yakanomphela ufaneleka kunikelwa ubakhamuzi bephandle msinyana ngemva kokunikelwa imvumo.

Phezulu

Amagadango okufanele alandelwe

Zalisa amaforomo BI-63 no BI-757 kwelinye nelinye i-ofisi leeNdaba zeKhaya. Yenza isibawo ebuzendeni namkha imitjhini yeSewula Afrika nawungaphetjheya.
Veza imvumo yokuhlala yakanomphela esebenzako namkha ukubekelwa ngaphandle.
Letha isitifikhethi sokuvunyelwa samapholisa.
Letha iforomo lesibawo elizalisiweko BI-9 negadangiso elizeleko lemino kanye neenthombe ezimbili zakamazisi nayikuthi uneminyaka engaphezulu kweli-15. Lokhu kukwenzela ukufumana incwadi kamazisi ngemva kokuvunywa kokunikelwa ubakhamuzi kwephandle.
Umbelethi othintekako angenza isibawo enzela umntwana osese mncani kwesinye nesinye isikhathi, kodwana nayikuthi umntwana uhlala eSewula Afrika unomphela begodu nangokomthetho.
Nayikuthi iimbawo zakho zivunyiwe, uzakubawiwa bona utlikitle iNcwadi yokuThembeka begodu uzakunikelwa isitifikhethi sokunikelwa kwephandle ubakhamuzi esinenomboro R.
Incwadi yokuzazisa izakukhutjhwa beyithunyelelwe umbawi.
Ababawi iimbawo zabo ezaliweko bazakwaziswa ngokufaneleko.

Phezulu

Imithetho esetjenziswako



South African Citizenship Act, 1995

Isibawo sokungenela i-learnership nayikuthi awusebenzi

Ihlathululo
Amagadango okufanele alandelwe
Imithetho esetjenziswako
Amazinga wokusebenza nesikhathi
Iindleko
Amaforomo azaliswako
Imininingwana yokuthintana

Ihlathululo

I-learnership lihlelo lokufunda elirholela ekufumaneni ukufaneleka umsebenzi. Ama-learnership afaka ukufunda kwangeklasini esentha yezabasebenzi namkha ekholiji kanye nokufunda usemsebenzini endaweni yokusebenzela. Nawuzazibandakanya ku-learnership, umqatjhi kufanele afune abe akunikele i-learnership.

Ngubani ongenza isibawo?

Omunye nomunye oqeda isikolo, ekholiji, eyunivesithi begodu nongasebenziko. Abantu abangasebenziko kufanele bazitlolise njengabantu abafuna umsebenzi nomNyango wezabaSebenzi.
Akunamali ebhadelwa mumuntu ofuna ukungenela i-learnership. Woke okhethelwe ihlelo le-learnership kufanele afumane imali yesizo ebuya kumqatjhi.
Ubude be-learnership buzakuhluka ikoro nekoro kodwana angeze baba bufitjhani ukudlula unyaka.

Nawufuna ilwazi elinabileko, yiya ku-website yomNyango wezabaSebenzi.

Top

Amagadango okufanele alandelwe

Cabanga ngomhlobo webandulo nomsebenzi owufunako. Ngamanye amagama, nawuthanda ukuba ngaphandle isikhathi eside, ungenzi isibawo somsebenzi wokuhlala nge-ofisini isikhathi eside.
Yenza i-CV enikela ngemininingwana yakho efana nelandelako:

Igama lakho nelanga lamabeletho
Ifundo; isikolo ebewufunda kiso nokufaneleka onakho
Ilemuko lomsebenzi; amagama wabaqatjhi abadlululileko nalokho ebewukwenza
Amanye amakghono afana namakghono wekhompyutha; nanyana unelayisense yokutjhayela, njll.
Amareferensi 

Zitlolise njengomuntu ofuna umsebenzi esentha yezabasebenzi eseduze. Lokhu kuzakurhelebha abaqatjhi ukukufumana nabafuna bona uzokuthoma i-learnership.
Thintana nama-SETA ukuthola bona ngibaphi abaqatjhi abanikela ngama-learnership 
Bawa abangani nomndeni bakuqalele iinkhala begodu uqale imikhangiso emaphephandabeni.
Hlala uthintana nesentha yezabasebenzi yakho begodu ulethe imininingwana yakho ebujameni banjesi nayikutjhugulukako.

Top

Skill Development Act, 1998  
Basic Conditions of Employment Act, 1997 , Sectoral Determination No. 5 .

Top

Isibawo semvumo yomuntu ofuna i-asayilamu

Ihlathululo
Amagadango okufanele alandelwe
Imithetho esetjenziswako
Amazinga wokusebenza nesikhathi
Iindleko
Amaforomo azaliswako
Imininingwana yokuthintana

Ihlathululo

Isibawo se-asayilamu sibawo esenziwa mbawi sokobana athathwe njengombaleki.

Ofuna i-asayilamu mumuntu obaleke enarheni yakhe ngokwesaba ukutlhagiswa , begodu nofuna ukuba mbaleki – kilokhu eSewula Afrika. Umbawi uhlala angofuna i-asayilamu ngesikhathi isibawo sakhe sisatjhejwa.

Ofuna i-asyilamu unikelwa imvumo yokudlula ye-asayilamu engavuselelekiko endaweni yokungena eSewula Afrika . Imvumo isebenza amalanga alitjhumi nane begodu igunyaza umnikazi ukubika e-Ofisini eliseduze lokwAmukelwa kwabaBaleki  nawuzakwenza isibawo se-asayilamu.

Umbaleki mumuntu onikelwe ubujamo be-asayilamu nokuvikelwa ngokuya komThetho wabaBaleki ka-1998.

Nawufuna ilwazi elinabileko, yiya ku-website yomNyango weeNdaba zeKhaya

Top

Amagadango okufanele alandelwe

Wena, njengomuntu ofuna i-asayilamu kufanele wenze isibawo ngokwakho e-Ofisini lokwAmukelwa kwabaBaleki elikhonjiweko lapho kwenziwa okulandelako:

Ukuhlolwa ngaphambi kwayo yoke into.
Igadangiso lakho lemino liyathathwa.
Kufunwa umrhumutjhi 

I-Ofisi lokwAmukelwa kwabaBaleki lenza ikulumiswano yokuthoma begodu kuzaliswa iforomo BI-1590.
Kugadangiswa, kutlikitlwe, kustentjwe bewunikelwe imvumo yofuna i-asayilamu.
Imvumo esebenza amalanga amatjhumi amathathu izakuvumela ukuhlala eSewula Afrika isikhatjhana. Imvumo ingalulwa ngamanye amalanga amatjhumi amathathu kanye neenyanga ezintathu ukudlula lapho.
Ngaphambi kokuphela kwemvumo yomuntu ofuna i-asayilamu kufanele uzibonakalise e-Ofisini lokwAmukelwa kwabaBaleki ukuyokubamba ikulumiswano yesibili, ezakwenziwa siPhathiswa sokuQuntwa kobuJamo babaBaleki .
I-RSDO iragela phambili nokongamela isibawo begodu ithatha isiqunto mayelana nesibawo se-asayilamu.
Nawunikelwa i-asayilamu , kufanele wenze isibawo sekarada le-smart lokuzazisa lombaleki kwelinye nelinye i-RRO kungakapheli amalanga alitjhumi nahlanu.
Ngemva kokunikelwa ikarada, ungenza isibawo somTlolo wokuKhamba wesiVumelwano seHlangano yeenTjhaba eziBumbeneko ) kwelinye nelinye i-RRO.
Ubujamo bombaleki buhlala iminyaka emibili, kodwana kufanele utlole incwadi ebawa ukubuyekezwa namkha ukululwa kobujamo bakho bombaleki iinyanga ezintathu ngaphambi kokuphela kwabo.

Top

Imithetho esetjenziswako

Refugee Act, 1998  
1951 UN Convention relating to the Status of Refugees 
1969 OAU Convention Governing the Specific Aspects of Refugee Problems in Africa 
1967 Protocol relating to the Status of Refugees 
1993 Basic Agreement between the Government of South Africa and the UNHCR 
The Immigration Act, 2002  as amended
